Standing next to the Pokeball is a Chimchar, and as you expected, she is gigantic compared to you. However, the sight doesn’t frighten you at all. This is your starter, and although you only met each other recently, you two have quickly grown quite attached to each other. You enjoy her cheerful, feisty attitude, and she seems to respect your ambition as a trainer. You’re happy to see her, and you feel a lot more confident now that you have a friend to protect you from the Shinx.

However, you notice Chimchar seems confused. She’s looking all around, and you assume she’s trying to figure out where her trainer is.

“Cha?” she asks, her confusion obvious in her voice.

“Down here!” you shout, waving your arms.

The primate looks down at you. For several seconds, her huge gray eyes stare at your tiny form among the grass. Then, she gasps and jumps back.

“Cha! Chim, cha char?”

“I can explain later,” you say. “For now, we’ve got a wild Shinx to deal with!”

Chimchar looks over at the feline. It’s recovered from the flash, and now it growls and lowers its stance.

“Shinx! Shi!” it cries.

The Fire-type frowns at it. She moves past you, shaking the ground with each huge step, and puts herself between you and the wild Pokémon. She crosses her arms and bares her fangs, and the flame on her rump flares up.

You look between Chimchar’s legs to keep an eye on the Shinx, and as you do, a thought occurs to you. Chimchar is pretty young, and still not a strong battler. Meanwhile, you have no idea how strong this Shinx is. It’s probably young too, but it might be more powerful or skilled at battling. If so, it would be a bad idea to let Chimchar fight it. If she loses, you’ll be on your own again, and the Shinx would probably devour you as soon as possible. With that in mind, it might be better to flee. But you’re not sure if you and Chimchar could outrun the wild Pokemon.

What do you do?
1242.title: Chimchar

choices: The Shinx is nowhere to be seen
The Shinx is climbing the tree
12422.content:
With some hesitation, you decide it might actually be best to run away. You don’t want to risk having Chimchar get knocked out at a time when you’re so vulnerable without her.

“Chimchar!” you shout at her. “Change of plans! Retreat!”

The giant primate looks back at you and cocks her head to the side. “Cha? Chi?” she asks.

Suddenly, the Shinx charges and lunges at the distracted Chimchar, its jaws wide open. You point at it and shout, “Look out!”

Chimchar turns around and sees the attacking feline just in time to dodge to the side. The wild Pokémon lands where she was standing and bites the air. You stumble back in surprise, because now the Shinx is very close to you. It’s practically looming above you. It looks down at you and growls.

“Shi!” it cries, preparing to lunge and bite at you.

Luckily, Chimchar won’t let that happen. She spits an ember at the Shinx, who cries out and backs away from you. You look over at your starter Pokémon and see that she’s rushing towards you on all fours. Before you know it, she’s reached you, and you see one of her hands coming at you. You’re roughly snatched up in her fist, and you scream in surprise as your feet leave the ground. Chimchar lifts you up and holds you to her chest as she continues to run away from the Shinx, using her feet and her free hand to lope forward.

Held in the grasp of your giant Pokémon, you suddenly get a flashback to an old movie you watched once, in which a giant Slaking rampages in a city and kidnaps a woman. After seeing that movie, a part of you always wondered what it might feel like to be grabbed by a giant hand, and now you know the answer. Chimchar’s hand is soothingly warm and soft, but her grip is also more painful than you expected, since she’s squeezing you very tightly to avoid dropping you. This also means you’re completely immobilized except for your head. You ignore the strong urge to squirm, since you know it would be pointless.

Your entire forward view is comprised of the fuzzy, cream-colored chest of your Pokémon, so you can’t see if the Shinx is pursuing you. You look over your shoulder, in the direction Chimchar is moving, and see she’s going towards a tree. Without missing a beat, the primate leaps at the trunk and begins to clamber up it. She moves quickly and skillfully, even though one of her hands is occupied with holding you. You gulp as you see the ground getting farther and farther away. You hope your starter doesn’t drop you by accident.

Soon, Chimchar stops climbing the trunk and steps out onto a thick branch. She sits down and closes her eyes. She’s breathing heavily. She takes a minute to catch her breath, then lifts you up to her face and smiles. You smile back.

“Great job!” you say. “That was a perfect escape!”

“Chim, chi chi,” she says, smirking and winking at you. Your compliment inflated her ego, it seems.

You try to look down at the ground to see if the Shinx is there, but you can’t see past Chimchar’s hand. You look at her and ask, “Hey, do you see the Shinx anywhere?”

She leans forward and looks down from the tree branch. What does she see?
12422.title: Running away

choices: The Shinx is done playing, and it's hungry.
The Shinx is wants to play with you more.
The Shinx is done playing, and wants pets.
1245.content:
You press on the button as hard as you can, but it's no use. The device just cannot detect your minuscule amount of pressure. You're too small! You make an audible cry of defeat, as you know your fate was sealed.

And like a scripted play, you feel the Shinx's mouth envelope your legs, as you are dragged off of the Pokeball. You try to cling onto it, but its slippery surface doesn't give you much of a grip. You feel your body sink down into the maw, but stop right when your head reaches the Shinx's lips. You feel its tongue pressing on your whole body, soaking your clothes with its saliva.

"Shmmm," You hear the Pokemon hum. It then begins to walk off somewhere, jumping over the Pokeball with ease. You try to shimmy your way out of the mouth through the small entrance that allows your head to see outside, but the pressure of the tongue on you doesn't allow you to even move.

Why hasn't the Shinx eaten me though? That thought repeats through your head. The Shinx seemed so adamant on eating you before, why wont it eat you now. Maybe it wants to savor your taste? And where is it taking you anyways?

The last answer is swiftly answered, as the Shinx stops at an open field surrounded by bushes. There, it lowers its head and lets you out of their mouth. You land face first onto the dirt. Couldn't the Shinx let me out softer at least, you complain to yourself, getting yourself off of the ground.

"Shiiii!" The Shinx calls out in excitement behind you. You turn around to see the Shinx's giant form towering over you. You can tell by their body language, the way that the Pokemon's backside is raised in the air with their tail wagging, means that they want to play with you. If you tried to play with the giant, you'd surely be crushed by it, whether on purpose or accident. You try to slowly back away, but even that makes the Shinx jump at you.

The Shinx's paws land right in front of you, causing you to lose your balance and land on your back. You are now in direct eyesight of the Shinx again, this time with them looking down at you.

"Shinx! The Pokemon's booming voice says cheerfully, as they lift a paw over you. They easily pin you down, but luckily for you, the Shinx does it lightly, though enough for you to not escape. It then quickly lets go of you and jumps back. Is it playing with me?

You get yourself back up from the ground again, and walk slowly to the Shinx. It surprising stays still for you to get very close to it, as you touch its lowered nose.

"Shii..." It then makes a soft noise, telling you that...
1245.title: Playtime

choices: The Shinx's trainer. (Female)
The Shinx's trainer. (Male)
The Shinx's Family
A wild Pokemon
12453.content:
"Shinx..." The Shinx drops the rest of their body body to the ground, causing the dirt around it to blow you back. The Shinx looks at you with their playful golden eyes, waiting for you to do something. You decide to try to get close to the Pokemon again, holding out one of your hands towards its ruby red nose. The Shinx this time presses its fluffy cheek right on you, putting the weight of their whole head right on you.

Surprisingly, it didn't hurt you, well not dramatically. You did still feel discomfort when your back got slammed to the dirt by the wall of light blue fluff, but the fur of the Shinx surprisingly felt... nice. You rubbed your hands on the soft fur pressing on you. The Shinx in response began to purr. Huh, who knew that Shinx's purr. After a few seconds of rubbing, the Shinx lifts their head up a bit for you to stand up, but still reach their head. They then tilt their head, as you scratch behind their ears. That's when you notice something interesting looking up.

The Shinx's tuft on the top of their head. Normally, no one would actually pay attention to it, but you knew something about it. If the tuft of hair is long that means that the gender of the Shinx is male, and seeing how even behind the Shinx's ear it touches your head, the Shinx you've been dealing with is a male.

"Shaaa~" The Shinx yawns in relaxation, as he rolls over to his back, right over you. You look at the Shinx to see that he has fallen asleep. It's honestly kinda cute. You sit down right next to the neck of the sleeping Shinx as your eyes begin to get droopy as well.

Before you can fully go to sleep though, you hear a rustle of a bush right in front of you. You shake at the Shinx's face, waking him up to notice the shaking bush as well. He fully stands back up, and takes a defensive stand right behind you, as it is revealed to be...
12453.title: Soft Kitty

choices: Go to Motostoke for help first.
Go get your stuff and Yamper.
A trainer appears before you can make a choice.
A wild Pokemon appears before you can make a choice
13.content:
Guess this is what I get for sleeping in the wild area. You think to yourself, standing back off and wiping the dirt from your clothes. But who would've predicted this!? Dragged from where I passed out by a Mew of all Pokemon, then shrunk by it! What am I even supposed to do!? 'Come find me' HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO FIND YOU WHEN I'M BLOODY WHAT! THREE, TWO INCHES TALL!

"GOD FDGSDVFB!!" You angrily shout, punching a nearby flower. After a few seconds of punching at the stem you fall to the dirt floor, red faced and breathing hard. What a mess you somehow got yourself in. You take a few second breather before getting up again. You need to find someplace that is not giant Pokemon infested, and try to find that Mew. Of course that's easier said than done, that Mew could have dragged you anywhere, and could have gone anywhere. She might not even be in Galar anymore, you don't know.

You take a deep breath again, try to think positive...... That's not positive thinking me, that's nothing. At least you can make a little light on the situation. Maybe getting some high ground can help you gain your bearings. You look around to see any high ground when you see a log on the ground. That'll do.

You approach the log, severely overestimating how much strength you have in climbing. You grapple onto the side of it, before ungrappling it instantly, you do NOT have the strength for that. Luckily, you don't need it, as looking on the side of the log, there's a climbable stick leaning on the size on it. Talk about a lucky break.

You climb up it to find that you are indeed in the wild area, and you're not far off from where you fell asleep, which was a few minutes walk from Motostoke. You can see the entrance to the city from the log you're on, which wouldn't be a long walk. Heck, maybe your bike shrunk with you. You reach for your.... Huh, there's a distinct lack of a backpack on you. If you remember correctly, you did go to sleep using it as a pillow with your.... Yamper.

Yamper! They must be so worried about you, and it's not a far walk from where you were dragged off too, but you need to get someone's help. You decide to...
13.title: Wild Area

choices: Try to Dnyamax me big
Chase down Mew
See if I can get the attention of another trainer
You get cut off, as she forces you to play
132.content:
You got to go and find your Yamper, she is probably sleeping on your bag right now. You need a safe Pokemon, considering you are in a wild area, and you could get attacked real quick.

“Yamper! Yamper!” you shout up into the air, but getting no response. You don’t know where you are, but you are gonna have to try and figure out where Yamper is.

“Yamp...” You heard a voice say. “Yamp...”

Lucky for you, she was a snorer. You couldn’t help but wear a smile on your face as you go chase her down.

You go to where she is snoring, and eventually find her.

Your little Pokemon, suddenly not being so little. Like a Dragonite on it’s treasure, it was laying all the way on your giant backpack.

Not really shocked about this honestly, she has always been a bed hog. You remember countless nights where you wake up, only to find her in her sleep pushing your head off the pillow.

You get close to the towering Pokemon, until finally you wore a smile. “Yamper! Wake up!” You shout to your Pokemon, thinking that because you are close she would hear you.

She did not, meaning you were gonna have to go again. Moving close you start scaling the backpack. Using your hands as you lift your way up close to her paw.

Knowing your size won’t let you do much damage, you start pounding and punching her paw.

“Yamper! Yamper! Yamper! ya-”

She heard you yell her name, and she felt the touch as she began to wake up. She nudged you with her paw, knocking you down and getting you to collapse off of your back.

You land on your rear as you look at the giant Pokemon wake up. Slowly opening it’s eyes as it gave out an adorable yawn..

 “Per?” It questioned looking around.

“Down here!” You yell to your Pokemon, as she craned her head down and spotted you. Your Pokemon looking at you for a couple of seconds as you can tell it’s thoughts at the moment. She got up from her backpack bed, moving closer to you as you take several steps back back, letting her get down.

Your cute little Pokemon, now towering over you like a threat. Still you were not moving, as this was a Pokemon you were comfortable around.

“Yep... it’s me.” You say to her as she looked at you even more. “Took a lousy time for a nap.”

The Pokemon just looked at you, until finally... she gave a smile. A big smile that showed her reaction to this. Moving her face closer, she brought her nose to you and nuzzled you with it.

Her wet nose against your stomach as you couldn’t help but laugh at it. “Okay, okay. I know.” You say to her as you try to push the nose back, only for Yamper to bring her tongue around and give you a big lick. One that shook you as she liked you this size.

“Okay, listen Yamper. I got shrunk by a Mew just than. I need your help. Maybe it’s still close. We got to get going!” You say as she understood. Lowering her head for you to get on. You smile at your Pokemon as you take the invitation to climb her neck.

Using her neck you get onto her back as you look back. “Gotta leave the backpack here. Good thing I don’t another Pokemon. Let’s go Yamper!”

“Yamp! Yamp!” it said loudly jumping around, almost getting you to fall of.

“H-Hey! Calm down, tiny passenger remember.” You say to your Pokemon as she did just that. Moving around and getting out of the tall grass. Seeing the Wild Area once again.

Honestly, for most trainers, it’s a giant area with lots of different zones and even more Pokemon than that. For you, it was more than giant, it was massive. Like the size of a whole country by itself. You can see the towering city in the distant, almost like the horizon itself.

“Yamp!” Your Pokemon barked, looking back at you. Your Pokemon loved the sight it had. You were so cute on her back!

“Uh... don’t know where to go honestly. She wants me to find her, but I don’t know where Mew is?” You question looking around. “Plus, there are so many Pokemon here, I don’t want to be near them.”

You got to admit, it was like every Pokemon was Dynamaxed from your perspective. Although Yamper is loyal, she is not really the strongest Pokemon. If she runs into a wild encounter, there is a chance she will win, but lose as well.

What else can you do though, but chase Mew. Wait... if you remember correctly? Isn’t the professor of Galar into Dynamax and the research on that part. If you find them, you might be able to get big again without even the help of Mew!

That would be amazing, cause let’s face it is the better option.

“Yamper, hide!” You say as she reacted. Getting down onto her stomach as you see a giant walk past. That raised the problem as well, you were so small everything was a threat to you. If someone wanted to battle you, you were gonna have to say yes.

Or else they might literally battle you! Pokemon Trainers, and In the wild zone more accurately are far more competitive than otherwise.

“Yamper?” Your Pokemon questioned as you thought about it some more. Your Pokemon did love having her tiny trainer on her neck, but it was clear you wanted to get big.

Your loving Pokemon though, she just wanted to play. She was far too playful, and this was a once in a lifetime moment. She most likely will help you, but a part of Yamper wants to have fun with you now that you were toy size!

“Okay Yamper, I think I know what we are going to do. We are going to ________________”
132.title: Your Pokemon Yamper

choices: A boy with a white Beanie and red shirt. (Male Protagonist/Victor)
A girl with a green Beanie and gray sweater. (Female Protagonist/Gloria)
A boy with blue hair and a sweater lined with fur. (Hop)
A punk girl with a pink dress covered by a leather jacket. (Marnie)
A boy with curly white hair and a pink jacket. (Bede)
1323.content:
You decided that it would be best to find a fellow human to watch over you. While yes, you did trust Yamper, Pokemon couldn't exactly buy food and it would be risky having to deal with Trainers trying to battle Yamper.

“Okay Yamper, I think I know what we are going to do. We are going to see if I can get the attention of another trainer. Not that I don't trust you, I just need to be able to talk to someone human."

"Yamper!"

You took that as an ok from Yamper. Yamper walked through the wild area, making sure to stay not only out of the way of trainers but also wild pokemon. You traveled across distant plains and bridges that seemed to span half a kilometer, despite knowing that the exact bridge was only 5 meters long earlier in a week. You peered around, gauging the various trainers that traveled through the Wild Area. You were looking for someone young and kind, as they would help you without ulterior motives, unlike some adults that would probably abuse the heck out of your small stature.

Most of the people in the Wild Area were big camper guys, breaking the rule about being young. They looked nice, sure, but people always gain a dark side to them as they grow up, it's just that most people tend to keep the darkness inside for fear of public prosecution or humiliation. After a whole day of adventuring you had almost given up for the day, wanting to tell Yamper to run into a bush somewhere to sleep the night, but it was then that fortune struck. You saw a camp with a bonfire in the near distance and ordered Yamper to run towards it. With a quick cry of its name, it bolted to the camp.

You inspected the trainer and saw that they were nice to their pokemon and were relatively young. It might've just been your reluctance to sleep in the open tonight, but you ordered Yamper to approach the trainer. The trainer was..

(I will give a sizeable amount of GP if anyone adds to option 2 or 4)
1323.title: Finding a trainer.

choices: “Aye, I’ll help you out.”
“Sorry, mate, I don’t think so.”
13232.content:
While the sun sank low, you rode Yamper towards the campsite. It was pretty small and simple, with just a tent and a fire, located next to some trees and a stream. A young girl with brown eyes and short brown hair was sitting cross-legged with her back against a tree. She was dressed in a pink shirt and skirt, a gray sweater, and large brown boots. She also had a green-and-white tam o’ shanter sitting on a large rucksack beside her.

The girl was looking up at the sky, and you followed her gaze to see some kind of bird Pokémon wheeling around. You shuddered as you considered how easily a bird could swoop down and devour you, but you’re sure that won’t happen when Yamper is here to protect you. Not to mention, this girl could provide you with even more assistance—but only if she turned out to be friendly.

Yamper had now entered the campsite. The tall grass gradually got shorter, and she was soon fully in the open. You took a deep breath as your Pokémon brought you ever closer to the girl.

Before long, the girl seemed to notice movement out of the corner of her eye, as she glanced over and looked at Yamper. She smiled and said, “Hey! Hello there, pup.”

Yamper barked and wagged her tail energetically as she bounded towards the girl. You weren’t surprised—she always was eager to meet new people. But now, you wished she wasn’t so excited; it was increasingly difficult to hang on to her fur. Thankfully, she soon came to a stop right in front of the girl, panting and gazing up at her.

The girl smiled more broadly, and leaned forward to get a closer look at your Pokémon. However, she hadn’t noticed you, since you were hidden behind the dog’s head. You were nervous about how she would react when she saw you. But it was almost the moment of truth.

“You seem friendly enough,” she said to your Yamper. “Do you have a trainer, lassie?”

“Per, yamper!” the dog cried as she turned to the side and showed you to the girl.

You and her stared at each other for what felt like forever. But then, she suddenly gasped and sat upright with a jolt.

“Och! Blimey, it’s... it’s a wee person! What happened to you?”

She sounded concerned, and that restored your confidence a bit. Perhaps she really will be nice to you.

“Uh... it’s a weird story,” you tell her. “Basically, a Pokémon shrunk me, and now I need to find her to get back to normal. But I have no idea where she went, and I’m obviously in pretty bad shape right now, so I was hoping I could meet someone nice to help me out. So... can you help?”

The girl hesitated for a moment. Then, she replied...
13232.title: Gloria

choices: “Aye, that’s her!”
“Naw, it isn’t mine.”
132321.content:
You breathed a huge sigh of relief. It felt like a big weight had been taken off your shoulders. Now you officially had a regular-sized human to help you out. This should make things a lot easier, you thought.

“Thank you so much!” you said. “You don’t know how much this means to me.”

“Don’t worry about it, mate,” the girl said. “Or maybe I should call you ‘mite’,” she added with a giggle.

“Please don’t.”

“Okay, if you say so. Seriously, though, no need to thank me. This is the right thing to do. Wouldn’t be proper to abandon you like this. Besides, it’ll be fun to have another person to pass time with. It’s a wee bit lonely out here sometimes.”

“I can imagine.”

The girl nodded, then tapped her legs with her hands. “Oi, Yamper—come here, lassie!”

Yamper eagerly ran over and jumped into her lap, nestling in and growling happily. You barely managed to hang on to her back. Once she came to a stop, you looked up to see the girl smiling down at you. She gently stroked Yamper’s head, and said, “Might be a weird question, but d’ye mind if I pick you up? I get the feeling it’s a tad dangerous to sit on a Pokémon’s back like that. You might get thrown off and break your bahookie.”

“I have no idea what that means,” you said.

“Your bum,” she replied, rolling her eyes.

“Oh—in that case, good point,” you said sheepishly. You weren’t too keen on being held in a giant hand, due to the inherent risk of being crushed, but you also didn’t want to be tossed off your dog’s back if she abruptly moved, as she was known to do. You figured being held was the least dangerous of the two options, since this girl surely had more self-control than your Pokémon.

You raised your arms as the girl reached down for you with the hand not petting Yamper. Her hand carefully closed around you, leaving your arms and head free, and she lifted you up to her smiling face. You smiled back. She was certainly being gentle with you, and it actually felt nice to be held by her.

“By the way,” she said, “my name’s Gloria. I’m from Postwick. What’s your name?”

You told Gloria your name and hometown, and then the two of you started chatting about your Pokémon journeys so far, and what kinds of experiences you’ve had along the way. Gloria occasionally threw some slang into her speech, which confused you a bit, but you could understand most of what she said. You quickly got the impression that she had slightly more experience in journeying and battling than you did, but she still only had two Pokémon. One was a Wooloo, currently in a ball in her tent, and the other was one of the three default Galarian starters.

“Can I meet your starter?” you asked her.

“Well, I’d love to introduce you to her—bonnie li’l lass, she is—but she’s off exploring right now. She should be close by, though.”

Suddenly, a patch of tall grass outside the camp rustled. You, Gloria, and Yamper all looked at it in surprise. Yamper barked and jumped out of the girl’s lap.

“Yamper, wait!” you shouted. “It might be dangerous!”

“Actually, could be my starter,” Gloria said. “Oi! Is that you, mate?”

You spotted some faint trails of smoke rising from the tall grass, and then you saw the source: a Scorbunny ran out of the grass, its large furry feet emitting puffs of smoke and embers with each step. The rabbit Pokémon stopped once it was in the open, then rubbed its snout with its paws and snorted before looking at the gathered individuals in the campsite. It seemed not to notice you due to your small size, though, and it quickly focused all its attention on Yamper, who jumped in front of it and growled, wagging her tail energetically.

“Is that your starter?” you asked the girl.

Gloria glanced down at you and said...
132321.title: Gloria helps you

choices: Scorbunny is winning the fight
Yamper is winning the fight
1323212.content:
“It isn’t yours?” you said. “Do you think it’s wild, then?”

“More likely, it’s some other trainer’s partner,” Gloria replied. “Scorbunny’s a species you don’t usually find in the wild, you know.”

“Then where’s the trainer?”

Gloria shrugged, and you decided not to press the issue. You had more important matters to deal with. There was a battle brewing. Scorbunny was glaring at Yamper, who continued to growl. The rabbit kept shifting its weight between its feet, preparing for a fight. Yamper copied it, as if she thought Scorbunny was trying to dance with her.

Gloria suddenly looked down at you and said, “Och! I got an idea, mate! How about you have your Yamper fight that Scorbunny, then I’ll give you one of my spare Poké Balls so you can try to catch it if you win! Assuming it turns out to be wild instead of trained, of course.”

“I’d love to add a new Pokémon to my team,” you said. “But I don’t think Yamper can hear me give orders from this far away, and I’d rather not get too close to a fight between giant Pokémon. Even if you’re holding me, I think it would be safer to keep away.”

“Then how about you tell me what you want Yamper to do, and I’ll yell over to her? Canny plan, innit?”

“Actually, that does sound pretty good. Let’s do it!”

You and Gloria looked towards the two Pokémon, and you started formulating a strategy. “Okay,” you began, “Yamper should tackle first. Take the rabbit by surprise.”

“Yamper, use Tackle!” Gloria shouted. Her loud cry hurt your tiny ears, but at least the volume ensured your Pokémon heard her.

“Yamper!” the dog cried as it charged at the Scorbunny. However, Scorbunny was too quick, and easily dodged it.

“Ny scor, ny scor!” the rabbit shouted, sticking out its tongue tauntingly. It started stamping the ground, and its feet began emitting puffs of smoke.

“It’s a lot faster than Yamper,” you said. “We have to slow it down. Yamper should keep moving to make some electricity, then use Nuzzle!”

Gloria shouted, “Yamper, run and jouk about, then use Nuzzle!”

The dog started running circles around Scorbunny. You saw her tail begin to glow and emit sparks as it generated electricity from her movement. Meanwhile, Scorbunny stood in place and kept an eye on its foe. Its right foot began to glow red as embers appeared around it, and it thumped the ground repeatedly.

“It’s charging an attack,” Gloria said worriedly.

“Don’t worry, we’ve got this,” you said confidently.

Yamper finally stopped running and lunged at Scorbunny, who failed to dodge this time. Yamper headbutted the rabbit in the chest to stun it, then rubbed her cheek against Scorbunny’s face before hopping away. Scorbunny groaned and rubbed its face, twitching uncontrollably. Its ears were drooping, and you saw little sparks arcing around all over its body.

“Paralyzed,” Gloria said with a grin. “Good strategy! Now it won’t be able to move or dodge quite as well.”

“Yamper should tackle again,” you said. “Let’s press the advantage.”

Gloria gave the order, and Yamper headbutted Scorbunny once more. The rabbit raised its arms to defend against the attack, then abruptly unleashed a flaming double kick. Despite Scorbunny’s paralysis, the attack came out very quickly, and both hits connected with Yamper’s head. The dog cried out in pain as she was sent flying back. The rabbit twitched a bit more, but managed to cough up an ember to burn Yamper’s flank. The dog yelped as her fur got singed. You winced.

“Even paralyzed, it can still fight,” you muttered. “I can’t tell who’s going to win this.”

You and Gloria worked together to continue commanding your Yamper. She and Scorbunny traded blows, and it soon became apparent that one of them had the upper hand (or paw, in this case)...
1323212.title: Battle against Scorbunny

choices: Gloria came out of the tent with Wooloo
Scorbunny noticed you
13232121.content:
You bit your lip as you watched the fight unfold. Scorbunny was starting to recover from its paralysis, and was regaining its speed. It started dodging more of Yamper’s attacks, and struck back with powerful kicks and embers. Meanwhile, Yamper was clearly getting winded. She was panting like mad, slobber flying all over as she struggled to keep fighting. You continued to give her orders, but she was unable to execute most of them properly, since she was too tired.

You sighed and looked down. “I think we’ve lost this one,” you said to Gloria.

“Right shame,” the girl muttered. “Yamper was doing well at first, but then this battle turned into a proper skelping.”

“Do you think it’s my fault?” you asked, looking up at her. “Did I give Yamper bad orders?”

“I don’t think so. Your strategy sounded braw to me. I just think Scorbunny is the stronger Pokémon here.”

You and Gloria resumed watching the fight. “In any case,” the girl continued, “don’t feel too bad. You can’t win every battle. But if Yamper faints, I think I’ll try to fight that Scorbunny with my Wooloo, and see if I can catch it myself. Maybe it’s a wee bit shan to attack a Pokémon that’s already been through one fight, but I guess I could offer to heal it first, if it’s willing.”

Scorbunny delivered another strong kick, and Yamper cried out as she fell over. Her stubby legs waved uselessly in the air as she tried to right herself.

“Bun scor, ny!” the rabbit shouted cheerily as it watched its struggling opponent.

“Looks like this battle is just about done,” Gloria said. “I’d better hurry and get Wooloo so I can fight next. Mate, I’ll leave you here to watch over your Pokémon. I’ll be back in a mo.”

Before you could protest, Gloria grabbed her tam o’ shanter from atop her rucksack and put it on her head, then placed you on her rucksack and ran to her tent. She vanished inside, and you watched her, stammering and trying to make her stop. You didn’t feel safe without her, especially since your Pokémon was about to faint.

You looked back at the two Pokémon, and sure enough, Yamper was on the verge of unconsciousness. She managed to roll over and stand up just in time for Scorbunny to roundhouse kick her in the face, knocking her flat on the ground. She whined once before going limp. She had fainted.

Scorbunny stomped the ground and let out a victory cry. You shuddered as you realized you were alone with this Pokémon, and now that its opponent was unconscious, it might very well turn its attention to you.

“Gloria?” you said, looking at the nearby tent. “Gloria! Hey, I need some help here!”

Your tiny voice grew louder and louder as you desperately tried to get the attention of the girl in the tent. You hoped she would hear you before Scorbunny, but considering the rabbit’s big ears, you weren’t confident.

After another couple seconds of yelling for Gloria...
13232121.title: Scorbunny wins the battle

132321212.content:
You glanced back at Scorbunny and gasped at what you saw. Just as you feared, its sensitive ears had easily detected your cries, and it was now staring right at you. It squinted its eyes and titled its head to the side in curiosity, then ran towards you. Within moments, the enormous rabbit stood right in front of you. At your current position on the rucksack, you were almost at the same height as its big, round, orange eyes, which were intently focused on your tiny form. The rabbit’s jaw hung open, and it murmured something under its breath, clearly amazed by the miniscule human before it.

Meanwhile, you shivered and backed away. However, you had nowhere to run, unless you wanted to fall off the rucksack. You could do nothing but stand there as the giant Pokémon examined you.

“Scor?” it asked.

“Easy there,” you said. “Please leave me alone...”

“Bun! Scor!” the rabbit cried. Then it reached for you with a paw, trying to grab you. Your heart started racing. Part of you wanted to jump off the rucksack to avoid getting caught, but you hesitated. You considered that the Scorbunny might actually be nice, so things might turn out okay if you allowed it to pick you up, whereas jumping off the rucksack would surely be very painful—and then you’d probably get snatched up anyway. So, you stood still and allowed Scorbunny’s paw to reach you.

The rabbit’s fuzzy fingers wrapped around you, then you were plucked off the rucksack and brought to Scorbunny’s face. It raised its other paw to grasp the paw holding you, making its grip on you even more secure. You didn’t bother trying to squirm. You knew it would be useless. Also, you had to admit the rabbit’s grip didn’t hurt. It seemed to be holding you carefully, so as not to squeeze you painfully. Plus, its paws were soft and warm, even more than Gloria’s hand. In any other situation, you would have enjoyed this feeling, but you still weren’t sure about this Pokémon’s intentions, so you couldn’t get too comfortable.

“Bun bun,” it muttered as it observed you. It sniffed at you, then abruptly licked your face. It lasted only half a second, but left your face soaked in drool. You groaned and shook your head to try and throw some of the slobber off. Meanwhile, Scorbunny grimaced, then spat on the ground, apparently disliking your taste. You were happy about that, since this meant you probably wouldn’t get eaten. However, Scorbunny still held you tightly, and it wouldn’t take its eyes off you.

“Scorbunny, um... please don’t hurt me,” you stammered. You were afraid it might harm you in revenge for attacking it with your Pokémon. But then you remembered Gloria had been the one yelling orders, so the Scorbunny might not realize you were really the one behind the battle.

“Scor, bun bun,” it said.

“Uh... does that mean you won’t hurt me?” you asked.

Before you could get a reply, you heard a loud noise from behind. You hoped it was Gloria, but it sounded like the cry of a Pokémon instead. Maybe it was Gloria’s starter Pokémon?

Scorbunny looked away from you and glared at something behind you. You looked over your shoulder and saw it was looking at...

13234.content:
Looking at this dark girl, you decide to get her attention. Despite her being young, and all her Pokemon was dark. She was looking at them with a loving smile, and seemed to be kind to them.

“Okay Yamper, going over there!” You say to your Pokemon and point. However you Pokemon didn’t move. “Yamper?”

“Yamp...” it said a bit scared, as you can understand. Looking over at the girl and her Pokemon, the Pokemon was scary. A Liepard, A Toxicroak, A Scrafty, and a Morpeko.

“Look I know your scared, but we won’t have to fight, and if they want to. Run like the wind. Now please?” You say to your Pokemon as it looked at you, and suddenly got moving. Heading over to the campsite. You prepare for what you are going to say to the girl, as you have to piece it together.

Sitting down, eating her food from the pot, feeding it to all her Pokemon, Marnie was enjoying her time with her Pokemon. Sure she faced some trainers, but it was just a good time with them. Especially since there was no Team Yell out where she was.

“Liepard.” Her Pokemon stated turning and jumping.

“What is it Liep-” Marnie stopped talking, as she looked over and saw a little Yamper make her way to the team of Pokemon. All four of them aware. Sure, Wild Pokemon coming for a fight wasn’t anything new in the Wild Area, but at the same time it was not something that was usual. Especially for a Pokemon like Yamper, so weak. Not to mention her team was... well to put it nicely scary.

As Yamper got close it started shaking and you got to admit, you did to. All four of her Pokemon towered over you, and they looked down scarily. Liepard was the first to spot you, and it looked like Toxicroak and Scrafty was next, none of the Pokemon taking the eyes off. Morpeko jumping into her lap and looking at you from it’s vantage point.

“Hey there, you a hungry Yamper.” The giant dark haired girl said, smiling down and getting some food for your Pokemon. And like that you were reinforced that this was a good idea.

Moving up you walk up the head of Yamper, until you were actually at the top. “Uh... hello there!”

You say that as she freaks out for a second, thinking the Pokemon was talking for a second, only to look back and see a small man on the Pokemon’s head. Her eyes open as she dropped her food onto the ground.

“A little man,” She said leaning her way in. “No way.”

“Uh, hi there. Sorry for intruding and uh-” You didn’t finish that sentence, as the Toxicroak’s face was worryingly close. And... did that Liepard just lick her lips. Oh boy.

Marnie was still looking after you. “You are real, I can’t believe it. How can someone be so small.”

“Well, it’s a real long story.” You say to her with a laugh. “Maybe I can tell you, you know... without your scary Pokemon.”

Her Pokemon has been called many things, and scary is always the most accurate. Not to mention for your size. She can just imagine what they look like.

“I would... but you don’t know hot much of a hassle that is.” She said simply as she looked down. “Morpeko can you get down?”

“Morpeko!” it whined as Marnie looked at her seriously. The Pokemon jumped down, but shot you a glare as it went down. Great... As you were looking at the Pokemon, you suddenly felt fingers on you as you panic for a second. Screaming as you get pulled and placed onto a lap. Her pink dress under you as you feel it under you.

“There, should feel safe there. My name is Marnie.”

“Ih uh... (Your Name)” You say as this was weird. Your first interaction with a giant.

“Well, mind telling me how you got so small.”

-

“And it wants me to chase it. So if you can imagine... pretty screwed.”

“You would be.” Marnie said simply as she listened. “I’ve heard of Mew. Heard she flies wherever she wants, knows Teleport, knows Transform an-”

“Yeah... I know. Not looking good and-” You trail off, looking to the giant cat Pokemon that was trying to intimidate your little dog Pokemon.

“Liepard, knock that off!” Marnie said with a snap of her fingers. As soon as that happened the Liepard looked away, and your Yamper jumped it’s way to you. Well to Marnie’a lap, two forefeet on her lap with the back on the ground. It was barking at you as you try to calm her down.

“Hey Yamper. It’s fine, Marnie is a nice girl. Her Pokemon may be scary, but they won’t do anything right?”

“They won’t do anything to you Yamper. That’s a promise.” Marnie said with a smile down to her Pokemon, which did calm it down.

“Wait... to Yamper?” You say noticing the words, but she was not going to linger on it.

“Maybe you should recall your Pokemon, just so it doesn’t feel unsafe.” Marnie said as she seemed to care for your Pokemon as well.

“I would, but my Pokeball is over there. Remember, not big enough to carry it.” You say as she understood, and actually got up. She got up and headed towards your bag, grabbing it with you in her hand. She put it down and grabbed the Pokeball, your Yamper excited to get away from all the scary and strong Pokemon.

Marnie returned your Pokemon, as it went back and into the Pokeball.

“That might be for the best, I mean Yamper was pretty scared of your Pokemon?”

“Are you?” Marnie questioned.

“Uh... well a little bit. Especially that Liepard that seems to be glaring at me for a long while.” You say as she smiled. Looking at her Pokemon it quickly changed it’s look. Marnie looked back at you and smiled.

“Now ____________”

"Now, Let's talk about helping you. Professor Magnolia or her assistant Sonia might be able to help you, but that's really out of the way for me on my journey and I need to keep up with everyone else to have a shot at the championship. If you wouldn't mind, I'd be fine taking care of you until I have the time to take that big of a detour." Marnie started giggling, a gesture you thought was pretty cute. Is Marnie really offering that to you? "You wouldn't take too much space or food after all!"

You sheepishly laughed. "No, I suppose I wouldn't, huh? Your pokemon don't seem to like me much though. I'm worried they would try to gobble me up when you're not looking."

Marnie laughed once again. "Yes, I suppose my pokemon can be intimidating at times. I'll be sure to either keep them in their balls or keep you on me at all times. So, how do you feel about coming with me on my adventure? I'll be sure to keep you safe and it won't be too long, maybe a month or two, depending on how tough the competition is."

"It's the best I got, so I suppose I'll go on your journey with you."

"Perfect!" Marnie cheered lightly, considering it was late at night she had to tackle the most pressing thing right now. "I was just planning on heading to bed anyway, so we can deal with your sleeping arrangements right away. If we were in the city, you could just sleep on a counter or something but pokemon in the wild area are notorious for sneaking into tents to steal food, and who knows what will happen if they find you sleeping. That's why you're going to be sleeping...

134.content:
You are in the middle of pondering what your next course of action should be, when you hear a rustle of grass from somewhere near the log you are on. You freeze, holding your breath. Maybe it's a Skwovet scurrying to a nearby berry pile, or maybe a Zigzagoon running around. Yeah, that's it, just a rowdy Zigzagoon hustling and bustling. You get your mind back in track on think of what to do.

That is, until you hear another bush rustle at the edge of the log. You snap your neck to where the noise was made, but nothing was there. You run to the edge to try and see it better, but still nothing. Maybe it wasn't such a good idea to get the high ground after all, making you more visible. You got to move now, even if you don't know where you are going to go.

Before you can, you feel a slight vibration from the other side of the log. Something just jumped on, and is probably standing right behind you. Heart pounding like a hammer, you turn around to view your new friend. On the other side of the log, you see an orange-maroon colored fox-like Pokemon with a bag-like tail you recognize as a Nickit.

"Nic?" You hear it say, tilting its head. To you, it sounded pretty feminine Maybe she's curious? You think, I need to be cautious though. She just may be hungry for a me shaped snack. You slowly try to walk back while watching her, but your heels reach empty air before you can make a single step. You're trapped!

The Nickit swiftly approaches you, barely making any noise or vibrations on the ground at all, until she's right in front of your face. She presses her wet nose right on your chest, pressing you a little bit off of the edge. "Uhhh.... Nice Nickit..." You nervously say, rubbing her muzzle. She then pulls back her nose, and you notice that she's....... smiling?

"Ni ni ni ni ni ni~." Is she laughing!? Oh, this cannot be any good. You are almost immediately proven right when the Nickit opens her mouth, letting you see all of it. Her tongue hanging out, her pearly whites showing bright which can surely crush you, and her breath taking out any of the cool air around you. Your heart practically stops, the Nickit is going to eat you.

You, without even thinking, fall off of the log backwards. She snaps her teeth at you, nipping your shirt, and tearing off a good part of it.

"Oww..." You land on the the dirt with a thud. "Geez, that hurt..." You can barely move, much less try to stand up and run. You look at where you fell to see Nickit's head leaning over the log, looking at you.

"Ni ni ni ni ni ni!" That's not good. You try to stand back up, but you collapse again right after, inciting more laughter from the Nickit above you. This must be such a treat to her, watching her prey struggle for their lives.

You then hear a sound from the log, as the Nickit has jumped right off of it. You shriek in fear, as her front paws are directly aimed at you. She's surely going to crush you doing that. You brace yourself, preparing to become nothing but a red stain on her paws.

Thomp.

Huh!? You feel pressure all over your body, but it's more like if someone threw a heavy blanket over you than an actual paw. You just then remembered what the Pokedex said about Nickits. "They have incredibly soft pads that compress lightly when in contact with the ground, allowing them to move silently without being noticed." She was just trying to scare you, and she sure succeeded, laughing even harder than before.

She moves her paw off of your face and torso, keeping them on your legs just so that you don't run away. "Nicki~!" She says happily, before opening her mouth again like before. You close your eyes, accepting your fate, when you feel the front on your shirt being lifted. You open your eyes again to see that it's in the the Nickit's mouth, as she lifts you up by it, your legs are dragged from her paws. She then starts to walk, making you swing gently.

"Geez, this cannot get any worst..." You mutter. The Nickit quickly lets go of your shirt then grabs it again, making you scream out a little. "NOT FUNNY!" You yell, as the Nickit snickers. Where is she taking you anyways?
134.title: Nicked by a Nickit

14.title: A good start for your vacations...

choices: You get her attention easily and she helps
You get her attention easily, but she doesn't?
She gets up off the bed, grabbing your underwear and... oh boy!
142.content:
With determination that would not quit, you run to the door and start banging on it. Making as much sounds as you could really, and as it turns out that was not enough. No one even heard you, inside of the apartment or out. not even when you added screaming to the idea.

“Come on! Come on open up! I know you are in the Indeedee, come on!” you say banging until you had to give up. not strong enough to really do anything. You pout about it as you take several steps back, trying to figure out how you are gonna get in there. You can wait for your Pokemon to open it, but that is going to take ages.

*Creak*

“Or maybe not...” You say as you turn around, seeing the doorknob twist and turn until finally, it was pulled back.

You could not only see the giant apartment that you were staying in, that seems to have changed to a whole new region, but your giant Pokemon in front of the door.

Indeedee, was massive! Now normally she was not that tall, in fact you would say the word average to describe her size. To you now though, well she is Dynamaxed! Even bigger than that possibly.

You take several steps back just marvelling at her size, as this was the first time she has ever truly towered over you. You’ve always been bigger than her.

“Indeedee?” It said, peeking it’s head out and looking around. Clearly it’s worried about you. She has always been kind and always thinking of you. To the point where she looks after you a bit too much. In the Pokedex, it has been said that the female ones have a sort of a babysitter’s emotion, and you would say yes.

Once she saw you weren’t there though, that’s when you suddenly realise. Indeedee was gonna close the door. You don’t have time to yell her name, so you have to start running and following her! Sprinting into the apartment as fast as you could really. Not holding anything back as you just want to get in there. You run for a long time, as the close gets closer and closer to the point where it was shut.

If it gets shut on you, you literally have no other option! You could wait until it opens up again, or you could just get in there now!

And get in there now is what you did. Sprinting and running inside as you get to the other side. The door closed, and the force that was used sent you flying. A gust of wind so powerful it sent you flying just in front of your Pokemon’s paw.

Not that Indeedee noticed, as she still thought you were outside, thinking about you in a worried manner. She turned her giant body and walked away, as you saw her giant dangerous paw walk inside.

You did feel a bit bad for telling her to stay inside, but you know a Galor Pokemon in Alola was just begging to be taken. Plus you have heard of Team Skull, so you were just not risking it.

Still she seemed bored.
 As she walked around, she went over to your bed and started laying on it, her big stomach on for show as you smile.

Whenever you were starting to feel tired and a bit out of it, Indeedee would let you lay your head on her stomach. You swear it was softer than any pillow that has been created. At your size now, it would be less of a pillow and more of the bed itself. Thinking about it for a couple of seconds, you question what you are going to do at this point.

Your Pokemon was so far away, and it was not like you could risk waiting for it to come and step on you.

You pause for a couple of seconds as you suddenly remember. Focusing your mind, to intend to talk to her that. ‘Indeedee, listen I know this might sound weird but I need your help. I’m small and on the floor. Please pick me up.’ You thought hard as you look up to her for any reaction. Only to be quickly reminded that she starts the talk, while you can not.

With a frown, you move down and rethink your game plan. What are you going to do at this point? Being small and useless sucks.

You at the giant room you were staying at and frown. Are you really going to have to climb your giant bed, you don’t want to but it seems you are gonna have to if you want to last.

Moving around and getting close under, you move your hands around and try to think for a couple of seconds how you are going to get up there. Climb really is your best option?

It’s sad but it’s the truth. Breathing in and closing your eyes, you get going and start making your way up. Slowly but surely, a simple Joltik climbing the way up. I went up for a real long time, going as high as I can.

Indeedee not even being aware, as you had to make your way up. Even if you get her attention, what are you going to do. Indeedee is not strong enough to fight a Mew! Then again we probably won’t even be able to find it in the end. You are NOT living the rest of your life this size, and you can’t Dynamax humans.

You frown as you finally get up on top. Looking at your laying Pokemon as she has not even paid attention to you at this point.

At least you were close to her, real close. You need to go around and get to her face. At that point, she has not only got to see you, but help you as well. After all, Indeedee loves you, and she is willing to do it for you.
142.title: Indeedee's A Giantess

choices: Fill up a small bowl and let you washed by yourself
Fill up a small bowl and Indeedee cleans you by her own
Fill up the bath and... both of you taking the bath together?!
1421.content:
You were so exhausted after all your way you made. Travelled the large tall grasses without getting caught by wild pokemon, climbing the stairs, getting inside of your apartment by luck, go after your giant beast maid pokemon and having to climbing your bed which it was even more challenging than climbing the stairs! It's like if you're doing extreme dangerous exercises... Oh man.

Panting, you sit down next to your giant pokemon to take a break for a moment, your shirt is already all sweaty by your own sweat. Looking at her round shape bottom body, you could imagined how comfortable would been if you laying on the top as you see her stomach raising up and down by her breath. Speaking of her belly, Indeedee has asking you a weird question about herself "Hum... Master, I have a question... D-do... Do you think I look fat?" she asking you shyly and of course, you reply "*Chuckle* Of course not! You just have a round shaped on your bottom just like the other females!" and for cheer her up you doing raspberries on her belly which it work as she's amusing and it get it out of her mind...

Anyway... Back to the reality, you snap out as you must continue. "(Come on *Your name*.)" you say to yourself "(We almost there.)" you walk on your bed passing by her side and at last, you reach to the side of her head as she still starting at the cell. You take a deep breath and here go nothing you begin to call her out.

"Indeedee! Wake up!" you scream as your giant Indeedee jump back in alert "Dee?!"

Indeedee get up and look around still sitting on your bed. "[Master? Where are you?]" *That her poke speech which you can't understand what it saying*

"Indeedee! Down here!" you yell as she look down and saw your tiny form waving at her that cause her to jump back again, let out "Indee!?" noises and fell off of the bed. Not too long, she quickly get up and come take a close look at you. Putting her both hands paws on her mouth as she's immediately recognized you.

"[Oh my...] she say with concerned expression before she begins to speak with telepathy. "{Master *Your name*! Is that really you?!}" *That's her telepathy speech and remember only YOU could heard her voice.* You nodded.

"{What happened to you? Why are you so small?}" she asks in shock, she's clearly worry about you right now and maybe worst.

"*Sigh* Its a long story..." you reply.

Few moments later, after you explain her everything of what happened. Indeedee takes you on the table and serves you a flesh water glass. Without hesitation, you dive your head in and drinking the water as you can, because you need it. After you done the conversation continue...

"Ha! Thank you, Indeedee! I was seriously thirsty and it just what I needing!" you say but it doesn't change the fact that your pokemon is not really happy for your situation as she's sit on the chair facing to your tiny size with a serious look.

{So, let me get the straight. You met a legendary pokemon named Mew who come to playing with you and at the end it decides to shrink you down and challenges you to find it, correct?}" she asks

"Correct. But now that's the problem, I don't know where is it and I can't tell if it still in Melemele island or-" but then you get cut by your pokemon.

"{How many times I have to tell you?} she says "Huh?" "{You shouldn't go out without me.}"

"Come on, Indeedee! I'm 13 and soon 14 in few months and-"

"{So, even small pokemons could be dangerous no matter how old you are!} she cut you again "{Just look at yourself! We just arrived here and you got yourself shrunk by that legendary pokemon and what worst could happen to you?}"

"Look even if you were been with me, you may end up to be shrunk as well. Plus you're not really good in battle. The only offensive move you know is Stored power and the rest of the moves are Play nice, Helping hand and Heal pulse whice you always use this move to heal my wounds every times I getting hurt. How cou-" you getting cut again but this time it was by a loud slamming on the table.

"{ITS STILL NO EXCUSE TO GO OUT ALONE!}" she shouting angrily in you mind. For the first time you get scared by your own pokemon even if you were at your normal size and she is a lot shorter than you, you'll still be scared when she's get angry. Then you saw tears come out of her eyes, she's... about to cry? "{When you were gone... I was worried about you... you left without let me know... what if you get eating by another pokemon and I will never know about that you... you...}" she cut her telepathy and begin to crying.

Now you feel guilty to that, she's right. How could you know you'll get yourself into trouble. This time you do get in trouble and this is by far the worse one. If you doesn't made it back, Indeedee will never know your fate and she's deeply care about you as you care about her as well. So, you walk towards your giant crying Indeedee and begin to apologize.

"Indeedee..." you call her as she looks at you "I'm... sorry for the trouble... you're right I shouldn't go out alone like this... I didn't mean to hurt you that much but..." she listens your words as you continue "...But I promise I will never go out alone again and I want you to stay with me, because your my friend Indeedee... MY best friend!"

"{...Y-you will?}" she asks as she wimp out her tears.

"I will... promise." suddenly you feel a force enveloped as you begin to floating into air and you getting dragging towards your giant Indeedee who just catches you with her both hands and cuddly you against her nuzzle as she squeaking with joy by saying in her language "Thank you! Thank you! THANK YOU!!".

After a moments, she's finally calm down and bring you to her eyes level. "{Thank you, master. Now, we'll find Mew and returned you at your normal size! But first...}" then the happy moment stopped when Indeedee brings you closer to her face, sniff you and then back her head away in disgust and says."{...you need to take a bath. You smell sweat.}"

Embarrassed by her words, you sniff yourself and... yeah, she's right. "Hum... good idea, Indeedee." you reply.

Later in the bathroom, you were hiding in a case taking off your clothes while Indeedee prepared the bath. You going admit you're kinda uncomfortable be nude with the presence of Indeedee, even if it's a pokemon she still a female and you're a boy, you still feel it's kinda inappropriate. Then you hear Indeedee call you out. "{Alright master, the bath is ready.}"

"*Sigh* Here we go." you come out of the case covering your private part, you walk on the corner and you see Indeedee has...

A: Fills up a small bowl as bath perfect for your size and she lets you wash yourself.

B: Fills up a small bowl as bath perfect for your size but she insists to clean you by herself even if you could do it by yourself and make you feel really embarrassing.

C: Fills up the bath of bathroom which it at size of large pool and there too much water. You tell her but she telling it's not just for you but for both of us. That's mean you taking a bath with your giant Indeedee! And make even more embarrassing and uncomfortable.
1421.title: Got your Indeedee's attention

choices: peaceful garden with other Pokemon there.
peaceful garden with... other Legendaries!?
lonesome tree.
145.content:
It's no good, you can't possible reach up those stairs, not without some impossible upper body strength. Even if you were able to climb that, there was no way you'd be able to get inside. The only other option you really have is trying to get someone's attention. But who to help you? There isn't anyone in the parking lot so maybe you can try and risk the tall grass again.

As you are thinking of your possible choices, a shiver crawls down your spine. Did something sneak up behind you without you noticing? No, that should be impossible, you'd feel some kind of vibration. You quickly turn your body behind you to see... nothing. Maybe you're just paranoid. Giving off a sigh of relief you turn around to see Mew floating in the air right in front of you. You fall to the ground in surprise, unable for any words.

"Boo!" She playfully scares you, yelling that out loud, though you you were more scared of her sneaking up on you than that boo will ever get you. She laughs, "I got you good, didn't I?"

You stand back up, breathing heavily. "What happened to all that 'come find me' crap you said before leaving me out here to defend myself." You yell trying to catch your breath.

"Oh right, that. Wellllll, my original intent was to teach you valuable life lessons and maybe change your mind about training yadda yadda," Mew explains, "but that sounds long and booorrrrriiiinnnggg."

"So will you change me back to my original size?" You ask hopefully. Maybe with her change of mind she'd just unshrink you and leave you alone.

"Pfft, nah." She shoots down your proposal fast. She grabs you and brings you face to face with her. "I want to play with you some more. You're the first person I tried this out with."

"B-But my Pokemon Indeedee needs my help. She's alone in the motel room and isn't native to Alola at all." You try to explain to Mew, but she just doesn't listen.

"They'll be fine being alone." She says, now floating up in the air like she did before, but this time floating off from the motel. Laying down in the air, she sets you down in between her chest and belly. She then presses her wet nose onto your body like she did when she first shrank you with a gleeful look in her eyes.

You try to think of anything else to try and convince Mew to let go of you and let you live normally, but nothing you'd say would convince her. You sigh and lay down on Mew's soft fur. Not really being able to do anything, you doze off.

When you wake back up, it looks like time has passed from noon to the afternoon. Looking down from your pink platform, you see clouds and... that's it really. "Uh, Mew, where are you taking me?"

"Oh, you're awake!" She says, avoiding your question. "I was wondering when you'd come around."

Right when you were about to ask again, you feel Mew begin to dive down. Looks like you don't need to ask, you were about to see it yourself. Once you pass the clouds and lower closer to the ground, you see a...

151.content:
If you thought that being lost in this forest was already bad enough, you have never expected to find yourself in a even more vulnerable status. That Mew has shrunken you to a size that's even smaller than a Joltik and now, you are in great danger right now! Before meeting the mystical Pokemon, you were trying to get out of the forest and being too tried, you fell asleep. After you woken up, you saw her floating above you and for unknown reason, has shrunken you and abandoned you in this spot. You could've heard her say something about a little game in human language. You shrugged it off and thought that you are hearing things so right now, all you have to do is to get out of here alive before any Pokemon make a meal out of you. Not only that, but your new size makes your attempt at finding the exit even more of a challenge. Could this be what Mew is trying to do? Giving you an even more difficult adventure to make things more interesting? Guess so.

You go to the bushes at the center and make your way across it. This is the most riskest route you ever taken; the bushes are too dark to see and you could ended up getting spotted by a wild Pokemon. While you pushed the branches away as you go, you look around to make sure there's no danger around here. So far so good, there's nothing around here.

You finally got of bushes, completely unharmed. However, you are aware that this is only the beginning of your tiny adventure in this forest. You concluded that this is going to take days to find an exit around here and you are not sure how are you going to survive any longer. What you really need is something to speed things up like hitching a ride on a wild Pokemon.

Suddenly, you heard something that wasn't so far from where you are. It almost sounded like a series of footsteps which later disappears afterwards. There's no denining that this is a sign that someone must be around. With that, you think about going to that person and hitch a ride on them to get out of this forest; you highly doubt that they will ever find you due to your very tiny size, but maybe you'll try to get their attention later.

You go to your left of where you hear the noise and make a run towards the source. You can see a giant figure that is just standing at a clearing and by the looks of it, this person appears to be female.

Who is it?
151.title: Lost Within Eterna Forest

choices: Get her attention and risk her wrath
Stay hidden and watch
Go for the long shot!
1512.content:
Looking over you could see a woman, with short orange hair and a green cape. Now you read the paper long enough, and you knew who this woman was since you lived in Eterna City. It was Gardenia, the grass type Gym Leader. This could not be better, you were near a Gym Leader. A smile on your face as you need to get going and get her attention. If anyone can help you it would be her.

Plus better then being with all the wild Pokemon in the forest who would want to eat you. You get going and start moving, but you have to stop yourself as she bended over.

You will admit, you have a bit of a perverted size, and seeing her giant ass sticking out like that. Well you just had to stare in awe. You have never seen it in person, but you have heard that she had a nice ass.

You can testify. Not to mention your small size made it even bigger and you were being honest, even better. Guess there was one advantage to being so small. She walked around, walking around and looking some more.

You follow her at the moment, as you chase her around. Not getting her attention just yet, but waiting and biding your time.

Which turned out to be the right move, as suddenly she bent over to pick something up again. Giving you a good view of her tight booty.

However this time you noticed something else, what she was picking up?

She was picking up flowers?

“This one looks good.” She said under her breath, surely not expecting a small person to be listening. “I home she likes them. Oh tonight just has to be perfect.”

Well, now you were a little curious about it. What does she mean by that. Sure you could get her attention, but you were going to follow and see what she means.

She walked around, grabbing more flowers until you put your thought into gear. Since you don’t want to get her attention just yet, you are still gonna be prepared. So you go over and jump onto her boot. Dirt and grass on it as she turned her body around.

“There, that should be nice. Just got to put it in a vase.” She said to herself as you look at the giant girl. So it was going to be a present?

Flowers from Eterna City. Seems about fitting for her, but who is she giving it too?

You stare up at her curious for a couple of seconds until she said something you were honestly not expecting.

“This night has to be perfect, for Candice.” Gardenia said with a type of determination.

While you were left stunned and thinking about this. This was for Candice, the Ice gym leader from Snowbelle City. You guess it makes sense, Gym Leaders would be friends, considering they share the same position. She must be coming down to visit her friend. That’s what you thought, and didn’t put more into it.

Seems like jumping on her boot was the right move, cause as soon as you made that together, she started to move and walk away. She left and walked away going out of the forest. You freak out for a couple of seconds as you made sure you were safe and not going to be thrown around. Holding yourself as she walked.

Thinking about it, Gardenia would of been in the forest so many times, and seems to want to leave so you were safe. You were safe and not going to be thrown around.

And Gardenia knew her way out. In no time at all, she left the forest, making it seem easily if anything. Every step that she took though she covered a lot of ground, and you feel like you would of done pretty good yourself if you did that.

She got out and crossed the bridge to her city. Looking at it, you remember knowing it, but not at this size. What should you do?

Well hang on for dear life. Why would you let go and be loose in the city, while you can hang on and be safe. So you do just that, as she walked around and away. Away for a long time as she got to her Gym.

She made her way in as she the doors opened, and she hurried her way to her quarters. You have no idea why she was so quick to impress Candice, but seeing that she was so busy, that was not good for you.

Maybe you should wait on getting her attention and help. Don’t want to ruin her day and make her hate you. Granted you have heard that she was a nice woman, so chances are she won’t do that. Still to be safe though and-

Your train of thought went away, as she entered her personal quarters and you saw... well you would say a screw chamber.

Candles ready to be light, clean as a whistle with a purple tone over it, as well as petals on the bed.

She is planning to... she is planning to bed Candice. That’s why she was so passionate about it, because well...

You didn’t know she was a lesbian? Regardless, you were in her room so you get off the boot. Getting to the side as you see the giant gym leader move around and get close to one of the desks. Putting the flowers in a jar and hanging it in a really nice place.

What were you going to do? You can’t get her attention now! She was obviously planning something big, and if you interrupted that, well you wouldn’t be happy about it so you doubt she would.

You could hide and watch the whole scene. Getting their attention tomorrow and... well maybe get a view if things did get going.

Your other option, well your other option was... a long shot to say the least.
1512.title: Gardenia And Her Date
