“I came here cause i’ve always wanted to visit it. Like Ilex Forest back home, it’s famous for all the bugs. Look here, at this tree.” He said pushing it over. You listen to his words, moving over and getting closer at the moment. “A Kakuna has been there. Isn’t it pretty awesome, you can see it right?”

“Can’t say I can Bugsy? Can you Teddiursa?”

“Ur-Sa?” It shook it’s head as that became clear. She wore a smile on her face, seeing the both of you agreed.

“Well, I suppose not everyone can, i’ve been studying bug Pokemon all my life. I just love them, they are all so fun, and crawly, and small!”

He paused as he shifted his gaze over to you, and had to chuckle. “Well, small to me. Not so much to you.”

“R-Right. This is my first of day of being shrunk. Guess I should get use to this more.” you say to him with a chuckle. “Anyway, let’s have a battle!”

“Still? Little guy you are not going to win, and you will be stranded in this forest by yourself.”

“No, we can make it a One on One Pokemon battle than! I will still have one over if I lose. I want to win though!”

Bugsy looked down to you, and... well it was pretty clear you were a determined trainer. “Fine, one battle. But none after that.” He said. He got off his knee and started moving, walking away and creating some space for the battle.

“Okay, well if you want it you got it. Heracross, come out!”

He tossed it onto the battlefield, and as the ball retracted, a giant bug came out.

“Woah, Heracross i’ve never seen one before!” you shout to him as Heracross smirked.

“Hera, Heracross!” He said ready for battle.

“Calm down Heracross, this is going to be an easy win.”

“That’s what you think, Teddiursa do you w-” you didn’t finish, as Teddiursa moved you around and placed you onto the back of Nidoran. Nidoran didn’t mind as she let you sit there. “I suppose it would be too dangerous to be in your ear, well... I’ll try.”

“Teddi!” She said squaring off.

“It’s good you got a Pokemon like that. Teddiursa seems to like you, as well as be ready to follow you.”

“She’s the best.”

“Nido!”

“B-Best Normal type... of course.”

“Okay ready Teddiursa! Scratch!”

“Megahorn!” Bugsy yelled, as the two Pokemon clashed. And since one was a gym leader’s Pokemon, and one was barely level 3, it became clear.

“Teddi!” She yelled, being sent back by one hit and having dazed eyes.

“And the battle is decided. Sorry little guy, I win.”

“R-Right.” You say back to him. “Return Teddiursa.” You called your Pokemon back and looked at it. “Sorry, I promise we will get stronger.”

“Sorry little guy,” Bugsy said coming over to you. He walked over and towered over you, reaching for you. This time though, Teddiursa wasn’t stopping him. “But ____________”
155511213.title: "Battle" Against Bugsy

choices: You keep knocking on the see through door
You bring out Nidoran to help you inside
A trainer steps behind you!
1555112132.content:
You see the giant boy bring his fingers down to you as they were outstretched. You had no choice to do anything about it, as he reached down. He reached down and his hand and it came for you. You get grabbed, her fingers around you and making sure you could do nothing. He dangled you up to his face as he smiled. This was the first time you’ve been grabbed by something other than Teddiursa. Kicking your feet, you feel that you give the proper response.

“H-Hey! Bugsy it’s high up here!” You shout to him, as he had to chuckle. The boy finding it funny, and if anything adorable.

“Let me just get this.” he said as he reached for your belt. grabbing something between his fingers. “Wow even your Pokeballs are small.”

“B-Bugsy, what are you doing!” you shout defenceless to the boy, when you remember what he said before. “Wait... you are gonna put me in a bug jar!”

“Nidoran, return.” He called to your Pokemon, calling it back and giving it to you. You put it back to the belt as he got down on one knee. Still holding you with one hand as he kept talking. “Sorry, i wasn’t going to do this, but with how easily your Pokemon lost, they were lower level than I thought. Maybe you would of been fine with two Pokemon, but since you have one. I gotta pull rank and take care of you.”

“B-But putting me in a Bug Jar. Bugsy I-”

“Sorry but not discussing this with you little guy. He said as he pulled out a bug jar out of his bag. He moved it around and pulled the lid. He brought you over and dangled you. Noticing something as he had to comment. “No matter how much you kick little guy, it isn’t going to help. Down you go!”

He opened his fingers, and you felt yourself go free. You hit the bottom, as you see him screw up on top. He has officially trapped you. You feel the jar get lifted up as you see his giant body go past you. Until finally you were brought to his smile.

“Wow, I got to admit, this is a pretty funny sight. I normally have small bugs in here, but now a small boy!”

He toyed with you, as he moved his finger and brought it ahead of his smile. He brought it and tapped on the glass, as it caused you take a step back. Suddenly, it started to move around. He turned it around causing him to look over your entire body. Eyeing you up, as you struggled to stay on your feet.

“B-Bugsy!” You shout to him, as he chuckled.

“Sorry, but it’s just a funny sight. Now, time to put you on my belt!”

The boy moved you around, and brought you to his waist. He brought you to his high shorts and pushed you against it, making sure the jar was stuck and not going to fall.

“Great, this is humiliating.” You said to yourself. Looking up, at least there was halls. Still it was not like you could really do anything to get out of there. You were forced to accept what was happening.

“Well, are you gonna carry me back to Viridian City?” you question.

“I’ll be kind, I’ll take you to Pewter City, there you could try Brock. However, not now. At the moment, i’m gonna look at these markings.”

And like that, you were going to get bored.

-

You were still in the jar that was at his side, as he walked out of the forest. “Man, finally out! I see Pewter City ahead of me!”

“Good, can you take me to the Pokecenter than Bugsy, to heal my Pokemon!”

“Got it, and... actually.” Bugsy said thinking about it for a couple of seconds. He walked close as he pulled the jar to his face. Smiling at you, as the boy really did like this sight. “Actually, I might not be able to. If I go out there, i’m just gonna get swarmed by a bunch of new trainers. Gonna be a real hassle. Do you think I could just drop you here and you can make the distance?” he questioned.

You thought about it as you nodded. Bugsy got onto his knees and opened it up. He reached for you, as you got plucked from the jar. His fingers on you as you get set free.

Looking at your prison, you were glad he pulled it away and into his bag. It was getting dark, so you were gonna have to go in. As you stretched though, you found a finger tap you on his head.

“Now listen here, you gotta be careful. You are in danger at that size. Just get to the Pokecenter.”

“Got it!” You say back to him with a smile. The boy stood up to his frightening height as he got moving. Walking back into the forest. “Good luck!” He said, his giant shoe stepping pass you. “Hope to see you again, and who knows you might win then!”

“Yeah see ya!” You shout to him, waving as much as you can as he leaves.

You decide to walk by yourself. Mostly out of need, but a bit out of fear. You do feel like a worthless trainer. Not only did you fail teddiursa and let her get defeated in out hit, Nidoran watched you fail and get humiliated as Bugsy manhandled you. It was not something you were happy about it.

So you made the journey yourself, which was long. So you got there around midnight. This wasn’t the first time you were in the city, as you have been here when you were younger. So thankfully you knew where everything was.

As you got to the Pokecenter though, it was empty inside every trainer was probably sleeping. However that rose another problem.

Moving around, you found that you... well you didn’t weight enough to get the censor to open the door. You were stuck outside.
1555112132.title: Bugsy's Safety Jar

choices: You wake up with Nurse Joy over you
You wake up with a Chansey over you!
You wake up, as a trainer moved into the bed!
15551121321.content:
Nurse Joy: https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb...

Well, you need to get inside, and you think you do remember seeing someone moving. You wear a smile as you move over and start banging on the door.

“Hey! I’m on the outside! Anyone in there, and do you think you can help me in! Anyone! Anyone!” You shout at the top of your lungs, wanting a reaction, any reaction if you were going to be honest.


And you got one. As your yelling and small punching of the door got a woman to get interested. Her ears picking up as you see her walk her way over.

You know her! Well you didn’t know her specifically, but... well she was Nurse Joy.

She went onto the other side as you see the doors open to feeling her pressure. Sliding open as she peeked outside.

“Hello? Is someone there?”

“D-Down here!” You shout to the giant woman, as she did just that.

“Oh my goodness!” She said jumping backwards a bit. “A-A tiny boy!”

“A tiny trainer actually Nurse! I was wondering if you could help me out!”

-

Nurse Joy now has you on her counter. Talking to you as you explained your whole situation. Being tiny clearly was not something she was use to seeing in her guests.

“Wow, and even though Mew shrunk you, you still are trying to be the greatest Trainer. That’s admirable if anything.” She said with a smile. “Now you want me to try to heal your Pokemon?”

“Uh... if you can that is Nurse. I mean... they are small.” You say showing her your Pokeballs.

“Oh dear... this might be trouble. Too small to fit in the machine. Are your two Pokemon small like you?”

“No, actually they are normal size.” You say back to her as she wore a smile.

“Well, i’ll try my best. Do you want to stay in one of ours rooms?” She questioned to you with a smile.

“A-Actually, Nurse Joy I don’t think I could go to sleep if I wanted. It’s just... well when I faced Bugsy, I failed my Pokemon. Teddiursa got down in one hit, and I can’t help but feel it was my fault for putting her in that situation. And then Bugsy grabbed me and put me in a jar for my own protection, so I feel humiliated. I can’t even imagine what Nidoran was thinking when she saw that. Why would anyone want someone like me as a trainer?”

Nurse Joy looked down, as she couldn’t help but giggle. Something that confused you for a couple of seconds. “Sorry, you might not believe it. But this is pretty common.”

“C-Common?” You question.

“Not the whole size situation, but new trainers, doubting themselves. It’s something I personally deal with a lot.” The pink haired woman said down to you. “Trainers lose, even the very best in the world lose. Don’t let that worry you though, move forward. Are you disappointed cause you felt like you were a bad trainer, well make sure to act better. Be a better trainer, one that your Pokemon will happily lead.”

“Wow... hehe, it’s almost like you rehearsed that or something.” You joke as she couldn’t help but giggle.

“Now, I’ll heal these Pokemon, and put you to sleep. I will see you in the morning, and I can set you off.” Nurse Joy said. She moved her hand around and brought it under you. You got swept up as you were left sitting, your legs dangling over her fingers.

She got moving and went over to the corridor of the Pokecenter. A lot of the were occupied, but thankfully there was one for you.

“Sorry about this, it’s our last room. So many trainers during this time trying to start. I imagine it will slow down.”

She opened the door, and you saw a nice little room for you. Well giant to you, absolutely massive. Nurse Joy walked over to the middle, leaned her body over and let you drop down. You got dropped down onto the pillow as she smiled.

“Don’t worry, i’ll tuck you in.” Nurse Joy said as you were a bit caught off by that. Still... going to let it happen.

She made sure you were comfy, and brought the blanket over you and holding you there. She was not going to lie, she was tempted to kiss you on the forehead, which by extension is your entire head.

“Good night, hopefully you can sleep well. Don’t worry about your Pokemon. If I can’t find a way to use the machine, I will just use a revive and potions for them.”

“T-Thanks, that’s very generous!”

“We plan to take care of any trainer or any Pokemon. Now before we go to sleeper, can I take a picture with you... with my Pokenav.”

“A-A picture, s-sure?” You say to her confused. She smiled as she moved around. She brought it out and went into the camera. She turned it around so her face was in the way as she wore a smile.

“Say cheese please!”

“Cheese!” you shout of course, as she took the photo. She turned it around, and loved how it turned out. “Oh that is great! We are going to put it on the family messages.”

“W-Wait? Why?”

“Well, if you travel to other towns, you might meet my sisters. Want to tell them about you. Now good night!” Nurse Joy stood up tall, and turned the light off. It went dark was you were left waiting, until finally you went to sleep.

It is just like Nurse Joy said. You might of failed today, but tomorrow you can only learn from it. Become a better trainer, for your Pokemon. As you lay in the giant bed, you eventually go to sleep. Drowning out your worries as you plan to make the best out of the situation. You got two loving Pokemon at the moment, that was what you wanted after all.
15551121321.title: This Nurse Is A Joy

choices: You bring out Nidoran to sort things out
You are too afraid to confront it
155511213212.content:
Chansey: https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/c/cd/...

As you wake up, you rub yours. What a sleep that was. These Pokecenter beds are really good. Especially for your size. Now was day two of your Pokemon journey. Hopefully this day turns out better than day one. Train your Pokemon, that's what you need to do. As you get up you look at the platform that was the bed. Maybe next time, you can get your Pokemon to sleep with you. Plenty of space, and you imagine a bed is better than a ball.

"Chance! A voice said getting you to panic. You look to the side, seeing the large Pokemon next to you. It was a Chansey. It was smiling down to you.

Every Nurse Joy had a Chansey, and this must be hers. "Uh... Hi there." You say waving at the Pokemon awkwardly. "Did Nurse Joy send you to pick me up?"

"Chansey!" It nodded as you guess that was good. "Chance?"

"You wanna take me now. Sure." You say shrugging your shoulders. The large Egg Pokemon reached for you.

It's small stubs of arms grab you and bring you around. Right into her pouch. She moved her egg clearly to make way for you and that was appreciated. You pop your head out of the nice pocket you were in.

"Thanks Chansey!

"Chansey!" It said happily back as it walked out of the room. The Chansey moved through the halls. You could see giant boys and girls. Other trainers, clearly getting ready for their day as well.

Chansey went behind and called Nurse Joy. Who instantly skipped her way over you.

"Good morning." She said happily down to you.

"Good morning." You say back to her. "Thank you for the transport Nurse Joy."

"Oh it was my pleasure!" She said as Nurse Joy moved her hand over to you. You feel her fingers around you as you get lifted up. She sat you in her hand as Nurse Joy moved.

She walked out of the Pokecenter to the street. You waiting patiently for her as she went around the building.

"Sorry, but don't want you getting stepped on in there." She said in a caring way. She put you back down onto the ground. "Now here are your Pokemon. Fully refreshed!"


You put them onto your belt and smiled up to her. "Thank you Nurse Joy!

"Now some advice. Brock isn't here at the gym. So you can't face him. So good luck." Nurse Joy said as she then reached into her dress. "Also take this. It should be your size."

"What is it Nurse Joy?" You say to her as you grab the tiny device. Nano to her but to you...

"It's a little microphone! A trainer left it here long ago, and I knew that it would help you. Now you don't have to strain that little voice of yours."

"Thank you for everything Nurse Joy." You say up to her as she giggles.

"It was actually my pleasure little guy! Don't tell any of the other trainers, but I'm actually rooting for you."

"Y-You are?" You say with a blush.

"I just lover underdog stories! Good luck out there!" Nurse Joy stood up to her large and towering height. Leaving you alone as you were by yourself. Not for long though.

"Go Teddiursa!" You shout as you throw your little Pokeball, and out comes your bear.

She instantly located you and hugged you. Her favourite pass time or so it seems.

"Hehe okay Teddiursa. We are going back into the Viridian Forest, and we are gonna make sure you never lose again!

"Teddi!" She cheered as you smiled. Even after the loss yesterday, it was not enough to throw her off.

-

Thankfully. The large steps of Teddiursa moved faster than your little ones. So the two of you got back into the forest quick. In there Teddiursa thankfully put you back down as you talk to her.

Well through the new microphone that was given to you. It was something else, it was almost perfectly your size! Sure you had to hold it with two hands like an ice cream cone but still.

"Okay... Hello! How can you hear me?" You say hearing your voice echoed.

"Teddi" She replied happily as she made some distance. Wanting you to try again from a distance.

"Can you hear Teddiursa?"

"Teddi" She said happily in a reply. Coming closer as you smile, this will make it go a lot smoother almost like you were a normal trainer. You were gonna reply back to when suddenly she moved down onto her stomach.

She moved down with a smile as you smile back.

“Good, now that it works I won’t be hanging on your ear or anything like that. Now what to do?”

“Kakuna!” A voice said as you both look over the way. Seeing the giant bug Pokemon hanging on a tree. Just like Bugsy has been studying.

“Well... all they can do it Harden. Go get him Teddiursa! Scratch!”

And of course, your Pokemon went over there. She was able to hear you from so far away, as you couldn’t help but love it. She scratched it for a real long time.

With all the hardens made it happen for a long while, but eventually Teddiursa swiped it down. You can just tell your Pokemon was getting EXP as she was coming back.

“Teddiursa!” She said happily, even flexing her muscles in the most adorable manner. Although if you tried, you probably could beat it on the adorable factor.

“Yep, we are going to be doing that all day. Hope you are ready for a long time of training and levelling up. Now the real question is... bring Nidorina out?

You were embarrassed at the events yesterday, and you were a bit afraid of confronting her. Your Pokemon has GOT to be thinking less of you at the moment. She can’t be excited to have such a weak trainer, and well you are scared.

What do you do?
155511213212.title: Waking In The Pokecenter

choices: You three hear a trainer
You three hear a Pokemon
1555112132121.content:
You got to bring her out. Even if she hates the idea of you being so weak, you can't leave this hanging. You toss the Pokeball and your Nidoran came out. Shaking around as you wear a smile. She didn't seem to care less when seeing you, but she was out of the Pokeball.

"L-Listen Nidoran, I'm sorry." You say to your Pokemon. "Not only because I challenged Bugsy. But... b-because I'm so weak!" You shout your outburst catching your Pokemon by surprise. "I know you don't like me being small, I-I know you don't even like being with me. But I promise I will be the beat trainer I can be. I WILL make us unstoppable and... E-Even a champion! I'm sorry!"

Nidoran looked down at you for a long while, until she finally had to smile. Your Pokemon walked over to you and placed it's paw on your head, rubbing it around. She was... Smiling down at you.

~

"I know your weak. If you were in a battle against a human, you would no doubt lose. However... That's why you need me little Trainer. To be strong for you. I promise to be strong."

~

You couldn't understand what Nidoran said, but you felt the words. You just have to, as you run over to her leg and hug it. As tight as you could which in fairness isn't that tough.

"I promise we will be strong."

"Nidoran..."

"Teddiursa!" Your other Pokemon chimed in. Grabbing you and both Nidoran into a hug. Nidoran of course tried to get out but... You know what they say about a bear hug.

While you were being hugged against the large stomach of both your Pokemon and you could not be more happy.

"Okay Girls! Let's train you two up!"

-

The training day wasn't bad. In fact you would say it was a great bonding experience for you three. The girls took turn facing both Kakunas and Metapods. They were gaining so my EXP and you were loving it. You three walked around the forest. Sometimes being hugged by Teddiursa, sometimes on the back of Nidoran. Either way you were loving it.

We didn't only go against harden Pokemon. Weedle, Catapie once a Pikachu. The girls were getting stronger.

Which is also evident in their moves, as Nidoran learned Double Kick while Teddiursa learned Fury Swipes. More moves is always good.

Currently Nidoran was kicking a Metapod into a tree, as the battle concluded.

"Awesome Nidoran! You are so awesome and so much stronger!

"Nidoran!" She said confidently and walked over back to you. Your giant Poison type smiling at you.

"Okay now it's Teddiursa's..." You trailed off, realising your Pokemon wasn't there. "Where did she go?"

"Nidoran?" She said just as confused.

"Teddi!" A voice above said as you both look up. Your Pokemon was in a tree, on a branch and grabbing something.

"Teddiursa! You use the Microphone. "What are you doing?"

She smiled, as she dropped down. Onto the ground as she ran around. Once she got what looked like a wooden piece of bark. She put it down with Pollen and berries.

"Right... You like to make your own honey. Can we have some?"

"Teddi!" She said as you were a bit excited.

-

As she got it all ready, she brought the bark over to you covered in Honey. She seemed to like feeding you two. Moving around you take a handful of the gooey substance and take a bite. Beside you Nidoran was doing the exact same thing.

"Oh this tastes good! You has to comment as Nidoran was thinking the exact same. Teddiursa of course dug in as well as the three of you ate.

You were fully after a couple of bites, Nidoran more of course. Teddiursa ate the rest. Guess she really did love it. After the three of you ate. You had to be the leader.

"Okay... We need water. Maybe we should head back?" To your surprise a bit neither of your Pokemon were a fan of this. "Come on you two, not much we can do if we are thirsty."

"Nidoran.".

"Teddiursa!"

You think your Pokemon are arguing with you. You know Viridian Forest doesn't have a river or stream, so this was the only option there was. Then again... Not much reason to go back to Pewter City.

The Gym Leader isn't in. So where will your next stop be. You could go to the water gym leader Misty. That will require you to go through Mt. Moon.

You could go to electric type gym leader Sarge. You heard bad things about Diglett Cave though.

What to do?

"Nidoran." Your Pokemon said getting your attention. Just in time for her to bring her leg and push into your stomach.

"Woah okay... What are you doing?"

You question this, as you suddenly felt yourself tossed up. Tossed up into the air, high above into the air and onto your back. Landing on her as she smiled.

"Nidoran." She said smugly as you guess you should of expected this. You might be their trainer and technically their superior. You should of expected to treat you with less authority. Not that you minded at the end of the day. Still it would be nice for your plan not to get dismissed by the two bigger and more powerful Pokemon.

"Teddiursa!" She yelled happily as you look her way on the back. She already has filled up another bark branch with berries and pollen. Ready to go back for seconds.

"Really, are you that hungry." You chuckle.

~

"See that was a fun day! He's a good little cute Trainer!" Teddiursa said, her mouth stuffed with honey.

"I will admit... He's not entirely useless, he knows what he's doing. Still, we got to take care of him." Nidoran replied back, her eye looking at the trainer who was riding her.

"I don't mind, we are a team. And teams work together!"
1555112132121.title: Talking With Nidoran

choices: You beat Katie
Katie beats you
Before you two start, she adds a wager
15551121321211.content:
https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/5/51/...

Suddenly a sound got all three of your attentions. Eyes open as you heard the sound of a girl. It was around a couple of trees, out of sight. Although you could defiantly here a battle.

Logically you would assume this was a Trainer, with her own Pokemon. You were thinking, deep in thought about it.

"Ursa?" Teddiursa questioned as you look over her. Looking over to her as you see they were both paying attention.

"Well... I mean we have to be better at battles. She is starting as well, so this might be a good chance to train as well." You say to them. "You girls up for it!?"

This time, all they did was send you a smile as you knew their answer.

So you three moved your way over, and you saw this trainer.

She was young, a girl you would say. She was wearing sneakers, a blue skirt, a white shirt and a Pokeball necklace around her torso. 12... Maybe 14. She had long curly slightly auburn hair. Looking her way, you know that she was going to big.

She had a Cubchoo! An Ice Pokemon with a constant blue snotty nose. That's what makes it kind of cute honestly.

"Way to go Cubchoo! She said to her Pokemon happily. Crouching down and hugging it.

As you got closer, she got eager spotting the Pokemon. However stopped when she spotted you on Nidoran's back.

"Wait a minute..."

"Hi there!" You say to her with a smile. She took a second to really believe what she was seeing. "Seems like we had the same idea of training out here huh?" You start to move around. Getting off of Nidoran and standing in front of her. She was massive, of course as you didn't even come past her sneakers. She just looked down at you between her legs, as she just had to smile.

"What, you saying your a trainer little guy. Find that a bit hard to believe." She said as she then moved down. Getting onto her knees in front of you. That smile not leaving. She moved her finger around and gently pushed you back. Your Pokemon was talking to her Cubchoo so you were on your own.

"Well I am. Despite my size...” You say to her. “I mean... i’m small but my Pokemon are strong and normal size.” You gesture to your Pokemon, who are having their own conversation from the Unova born Pokemon.

“How can you even give them commands?” She questioned.

“With uh... this microphone.” You say raising it so she can see it.

“Hehe, okay you are the most adorable thing in the world.” She joked, bringing her finger and tapping you in the chest once again. Knocking you back onto your rear. Getting the casual girl to laugh once again.

“Can you not,”

“I’m Katie.” She said with a smile. Her fingers coming towards you and making you stand. Of course manhandling you. “What’s yours little guy?”

You tell her yours.

“So how did this happen?” She questioned as you pouted. You should expect that question a lot, so best not to delve into it.

“Uh... reasons. Anyway that isn’t that important Katie. Let’s have a Pokemon battle!” You shout to her as she had to laugh.

“Slow your roll there little guy, we will. Let’s just talk and chill for a sec. After all, not every day I meet someone your... size.” She lowered two fingers down to you. Gripping each side of you, as you get lifted right up into the air.

`

“You two really have a small trainer.” He said, the Cubchoo looking over to her own trainer. His voice of course coming off a bit nosey.

“Yeah he is, but that just makes him better! Plus he’s like really smart!” Teddiursa, finishing her honey and eating it right now. ‘He’s really good!”

“He’s dedicated, that’s not up for dispute. What about yours Cubchoo, what is the girl like?”

“She’s really fun too!” He said back.

~

And you were experiencing that fun, as she moved her finger around and gripped the back of your shirt. She held you there and started dipping you up and down. No doubt she was doing this playfully right in front of her face. “How does it feel, being this high up. If I let you go on accident, you would get really hurt!”

“W-Well I didn’t think about that until now!” You shout to the girl as she laughed. She moved you around to her palm though, to lessen that fear. So you are sort of getting a simple understanding of this girl. She was playful, but she wasn’t evil.

“So little guy,” She said as you instantly frown. “You training too? With those two? What’s your plan. I mean, just curious from one trainer to another... smaller trainer.”

“Honestly don’t know. Right now it’s get stronger. With Brock out of his gym though, that’s clearly not an option.”

“I know, it sucks.” Katie said. “So now we gotta do other things. The Viridian Gym Leader is way too strong, so it’s either go against around Kanto to other gyms, or jump on a plane. Me, myself i’m going to do the former.”

“Really!” You shout, a bit surprised at this. “You really going across to a different region?”

“Yeah, Hoenn actually. Gonna train here, until the plane tomorrow. Jump over there, and beat the rock gym leader over there.”

“T-That might be a good plan.” You say to her as you were deep in thought. With Teddiursa, the only types she would have trouble with is fighting and ghost. Nidoran was poison though, so she might have more trouble honestly.

“Anyway, let’s battle!” Katie said offering. Seems like she had the mantra the same you are. Battle everyone to get better.

“You just read my mind.” You say with a smile back to her. “Let’s get started!”

“Careful little guy, me and Cubchoo aren’t gonna be easy.” She said with a smirk.
15551121321211.title: The Lass Katie

choices: She accepts it, and is a little impressed
She is angry, and you are at her mercy
155511213212111.content:
Cubchoo: https://img.pokemondb.net/artwork/large/...

Pidgey: https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/5/55/...

And so the battle was on, you versus Katie. You two stood opposite of each other, some room in the middle of the Pokemon to battle. You both retracted your Pokemon, and are ready.

“Just so you know,” Katie started. “Because you are so small, I am not going to go easy on you.” She said with a big smile, a wide smile even.

“Don’t act like it’s a foregone conclusion, it’s a fight.” You say as you send out your Pokemon. “Nidoran!”

Out she came of course, and it seemed like she was ready as well. Katie smiled to herself.

“Well, how about this. Go, Pidgey!” She said sending out a bird, and since you two are playing.

“Really, a Pidgey, so common.” You joke to her.

“Common doesn’t mean bad, Pidgey, tackle!”

The bird Pokemon flew fast. With the Microphone you yell at your Pokemon to dodge. Nidoran rolled over as the Pokemon hit it's body against the ground.

“Double Kick to counter!”

“Fly up Pidgey!” And the Pidgey did just that, Nidoran almost got one kick in. You see it high above.

Luckily you could handle it. “You have range Nidoran, Poison Sting!”

Shooting out it’s quills from it’s back, they went flying to Pidgey, the bird flying around and trying to dodge. “Aim for it’s wing Nidoran, get it grounded!”

“W-What!?” She said, almost not believing that was the strategy. She watched as your Nidoran aimed.

“Fly up higher Pidgey, don’t let her hit you!”

“Push it as far as you can, don’t let it get out of range!” Your Nidoran listened to you, and pushed her Poison Sting as far as she can. Eventually, it stabbed through the wing. It was exactly like you wanted, as the Nidoran couldn’t stay up into the air with that injury. Flying Pokemon were strong, but they were also agile. Their downside, they have a very obvious weak spot, and take that out, it’s easy.

“Not going down that easy, peck Pidgey!” The Pokemon moved forward on it’s talons, as Nidoran got ready. You wait for it to come closer.

“Double Kick!” Sure it wasn’t effective, but you knew it would finish it. Nidoran turned around, kicking it’s two hind legs into the giant bird. It got sent flying back closer to you. You will admit, you jumped back at this, seeing the avian. However, it was out right now.

“Nidoran!” She proudly said.

“R-Return!” She called, calling her Pidgey back.

“Nidoran, return!” You say as well, calling your Pokemon back. Holding her in your Pokeball, she wasn’t as scary. “Thanks, you did amazing.”

“So you got some smarts about you little guy, well we will see if you are as lucky here. Go, Cubchoo!”

“Teddiursa!”
 As the two colossal bears stood opposite of each other, you wear a smile at your Pokemon.

“I’ll go first. Teddiursa, scratch!” Teddiursa charged as Katie smiled.

“I got some moves too, Icy Wind Cubchoo!” The Pokemon blow a cold wind to Teddiursa and you could see she was getting damaged as she rushed in.

“Forget Scratch, get out of there!” You shout as she rolled to the side. “You okay!?”

“Bet she’s not, Icy Wind can pack a real hard hit, not to mention, can slow down the opposition. Pound Cubchoo!” The giant bear came rushing over to yours, and even though you yelled at her to dodge, she got hit. Pushed onto her back, right in front of you.

“Teddiursa, you okay?”

“Icy Wind!” Katie yelled as you can’t believe it. The Pokemon blew it’s cold breath, small bits of ice sprinkled in like dust. You open your eyes, seeing that you were really close about this. Your eyes go open as you move around. Ducking behind your Pokemon’s large head.

“Hey Katie, i’m here!”

“Oh uh... Cubchoo cut it out.” She said to her Pokemon, as she didn’t really think of that. Teddiursa got back up, standing tall as you walk backwards.

“You ready for the counter attack?”

“Teddi!” She said with a determined look. “Okay, scratch!” You shout as she got got her claws ready and moved in, going across the battlefield.

“Oh right, Icy Wind again!” She yelled to Cubchoo, as the Pokemon pattern repeated, this time however you were planning.

“Now, strafe!” You shout to her as Teddiursa started moving left and right. Icy Wind was more of a less a straight attack, so Cubchoo has to follow with his head to truly get a hit in.

“Darn it, cut it and use Pound!” Katie said as her Pokemon charged in. Teddiursa was gonna take a hit, but if she can dish one out just as big you were glad about it. As the two Pokemon charged at each other, the collision was heavy. The two got hit, and Cubchoo got scratched. Now that he was in though, you decided to reveal the new move.

“Fury Swipes!” You shout to her as Teddiursa lifted both of her paws. Her eyes go wide, as the two arms got swung down, and slashes. So many swipes as Cubchoo was forced to take the onslaught.

“Oh no!” Katie yelled while you smiled.

“D-Don’t stop!” You shout as Teddiursa kept going, getting tired, but stopping as this really lasted a long time. When it ended, Cubchoo fell onto his back, his eyes crossed out.

“Cubchoo no!”

“Teddiursa, we won!” You shout to her, cause as as soon as you did she came over to you. Picking you up and giving you a large hug. She seemed to be as happy as you were, while Katie was not. You recalled your Pokemon, as Teddiursa placed you onto the ground.

You see her call Cubchoo over and look at you standing there. “Sorry, guess I win.” You say with a smile as she gave out a bigger frown. “I uh... n-nice match.”

It was at this point that you realised, even though you won, you might be in the same humiliating situation like with Bugsy.

How does Katie react to losing?
155511213212111.title: Versus Katie

choices: You go to Hoenn
You stay at Kanto
1555112132121111.content:
As Katie walked closer to you, you can’t help but feel a little bit of fear. She lost to you, what must she be thinking. Will she take advantage against her opponent, and get her revenge. You sure hope not. Looking at her, as she stared right down to you. Until finally... she wore a smile.

“Wow, you are pretty guy, better then I expected!” She said kindly as you breathed a massive sigh of relief. So happy about how it turned out. She came right over to you, lowering her body as she reached down for you. She grabbed you and lifted you up to her smile. She let you sit in her palm as she smiled. “Thanks for the match!”

“You too, glad how it turned out.” You say to her as that was meant in more ways than one.

“My Pokemon are out though, and I don’t have any revives. Gonna have to go.” She said back to you, as you thought about it.

“Yeah... sorry.”

“It’s fine, I don’t mind actually. Probably gonna turn in for the day, after all going to Hoenn tomorrow.”

“Are you?” You question to her. “Well, good luck.”

She looked at you for a couple of seconds, until finally she had to wear a smile to you. A big giant smile. “Hey, you wanna come with me!”

“M-Me?”

“Come on little guy, i’ll take you with me to Hoenn. I can sneak you in, after all... with your size it’s not like they will let you fly.”

“You have a point, but I was thinking about going through Mt Moon to fight Misty.”

“You could, but come on don’t you want to visit a new region with me! Be pretty fun, see Pokemon you never have before.”

“Uh... i’ll think about it. As for today, can you bring me back to the Pokecenter?”

“Of course, and since you bet me, i’ll be a good sportsmanship and give you a ride.”

“A-A ride?” You say when suddenly you felt yourself tossed around. placed right onto the top of her head, on her hair.

“Good up there!”

“I can see, that’s pretty clear.” You say back to her with a laugh. She got moving, down to Viridian City as you wait there. “Hey Katie, thanks for not... hurting me after the battle?”

“What do you mean?”

“It’s just one of those things,” You say back to the giant girl that was carrying you. “Being so small, literally everyone can take advantage of me. Say... I beat someone, and they aren’t happy about it. What can I really do against them?”

“Hehe suppose you have a point. Still could be worse.” She said to you. “You could be in a Pokemon’s stomach.”

“Guess that’s right.” You say with a smile as that was a unique way to look at it. She got going, moving over as you rest on top of her head.

-

With Katie moving, you two got back to the Pokecenter quick. The Nurse Joy there didn’t see you as she rented a room. Moving in as she healed her Pokemon.

As she got in, you saw a room identical to the one you were staying in this morning. Only now you were sharing it.

“Sorry I didn’t tell her about it, figured wouldn’t bother with the hassle.” She said as she placed you down. Letting you stand on the bed as she stood over you.

“It’s fine, stuff like that I don’t mind.” You say to her. Katie smiled at this, as she relaxed. moving and sitting down next to you.You saw her giant rear flatten the ground next to you as you had to comment.

“Uh... K-Katie, next time you do that, be careful okay?”

“What, scared you are gonna get sat on.” She laughed, finding it a bit funny. It was at this exact moment you realised you probably should not have put that idea into her mind. “Relax, you will be fine with me. I respect strong trainers, and I respect you. Cause you beat me.”

“Yeah I kind of did. My record right now is 1-1 with Pokemon Trainers.”

“No way, who did you lose against?”

You looked at her, before you figured you should tell her. Meeting Bugsy in the forest, getting beaten in one shot by him, and even him sneaking up and putting you in a jar. You were not a big fan of it but you did tell her. She heard it and listened, and laughed.

“Katie!?”

“Sorry, you got to admit though it was pretty funny!” Katie laughed. “Still, there was a gym leader in there, kinda sad I didn’t see him.”

“If I lost to him, you would of defiantly.” You smile to her as she laughed.

“What is that suppose to mean?” She said as you feel like she should no. “You got a bit of a wise lip little guy.” She reached for you, two of her fingers gripping the back of your shirt as you get lifted up. Right into the air and to her smile. It was so easy for her to hold you and dangle you. “You know I could do the exact same thing to you, right?”

“Yeah but you won’t... we’re friends.” You say with a smile, one that Katie had to respond.

“Yeah, I guess we are.” She said, placing you back onto her lap and onto her leg. You sit there for a couple of seconds. You were gonna be relaxing with Katie all night, so you might as well get use to her company.

“Hey, you didn’t answer my question before.” Katie said. “So are you gonna be coming to Hoenn with me or what? I would love to have you.”

You think about this, it’s quite the choice. move around to Misty or Surge, or fly across to another region and defeat the Rock gym leader there. You think you can do it, and... it would not be the worst thing to be with Katie more.
1555112132121111.title: Resting With Katie

choices: You do a good job
You do a bad job
You do a fantastic job!
15551121321211111.content:
You gave this a real long thought, before you look up to Katie. Staying with her would be a lot more easier than going by yourself. You love your Pokemon, but you gotta know if they go down you are gonna be by yourself in the wild. Plus, you will be able to face the rock type Gym Leader there. All advantages, no disadvantages.

“Well, suppose I will.” You say up to her as Katie smiled. She seemed real happy about it.

“Great! I’ll sneak you on board tomorrow.”

“S-Sneak me on board, no I’m good. I can book a seat myself.”

“Except for the fact that you really can’t.” She added, playfully bopping you on your head. “At that size, they would not let you get on. This will be easier trust me. It’s early in the morning, so gotta get there quick.” She said as Katie can’t get over it. She does like you, meeting someone so small, so nice... so cute. Katie has never been one of those type of girls, but something about you she just found adorable.

“Well, I guess i’ll just follow your lead.” You smile to her as she smiled back. Katie moved her hand around, and reached down for you. Grabbing you.

“Which means we got about an hour before we should go to sleep. I’ll get us food, and then we can have some fun. I’ve got some things I wanna try with you.”

“W-What?” You say, not only a bit concerned but very concerned. She didn’t reveal, as she lowered you down. She got up and left, leaving you to dwell on what she meant.

So you were going to Hoenn huh? So many Pokemon there, you are a bit eager to catch one of them. Not to mention face the Rock Gym Leader. You don’t know much about her, but you have seen her face in passing. If you remember she was a bit of a cutie too, that’s a plus. Plus now that Nidoran knows Double Kick, it’s gonna be super effective. This was the best course of action, you are sure.

“Hey!” Katie said coming back. “This should be enough for you right?” She leaned forward and dropped down something in front of you. It was a potato chip, from the bag she had.

She dug her hand in and ate about five of them, eating them admittedly pretty messily.

“What is this dinner? Shouldn’t it be more... healthy?”

“Hey, your lucky I even gave you one. Come on, eat up quick.” She said as she ate hers. So she liked junk food, you are learning more and more about this girl that is taking care of you.

Doing what she wants, you start chipping away at your giant chip. The both of you ate in silence, until you filled yourself up, and Katie finished the bag.

“It’s kind of weird, seeing how much I eat compared to you.”

“Yeah, but makes sense considering how tiny you are, finished with that.” Whether you were or not, Katie moved her fingers around and grabbed the chip from you. Eating it as well.

“Now, let’s get started with the fun!” She said with a smile, scrunching up the bag and tossing it into the bin.

“F-Fun?”

“Well yeah, I have had this idea for a pretty long time.” Katie said as you watch her move her fingers to her feet. She started to take off her shoes, throwing them onto the ground together as the next part was her socks. Taking them off as she smiled. Directly at you, which worried you to no end.

“T-That idea is?” You question as she didn’t give you an answer. Instead, she just reached for you, grabbing you and lifting you up. You did get placed back onto the bed, straight in the middle. You stumble around but manage to keep on your feet, cause looking ahead you could see what Katie was doing. With a smile, she laid across the giant bed, and stuck out her feet right at you.

Sitting on the bed, her feet where looming over you. Standing on her heels, and looking a bit dirty. Although you got to admit, smooth. They were scarily close to you, and even though you stumble back, you were a bit concerned.

“K-Katie?”

“Listen, I know this sound weird, but I want you to rub my feet!” She said, the happiest smile.

“W-What!”

“Come on, do it. I’m gonna let you come with me to Hoenn. It’s just a little footrub.”

“Katie.” You say to her a bit sternly.

“DOn’t be like that, just do it or they are gonna get you little guy!” She raised her foot, raising it into the air and very gently jabbed you with the side. Knocking you over but not actually hurting you. Katie of course laughing out loud.

“Really.”

“Come on just do it. If you give me a foot rub, i’ll let you sleep on the bed with me.” She said flexing her toes all around the place. Katie should be letting you stay there regardless but... you did feel like you owe her.

She did carry you back, and she is going to take you to Hoenn. Sure playful, but Katie has been nothing but nice to you. You look at her for a couple of seconds, before sighing.

“Just one foot rub.”

“For each foot.” She clarified, as you moved forward. “No way, you are actually doing it! Oh you are the best little guy!”

“Yeah, yeah just don’t expect this to be a regular thing.”

“Oh I will make it a regular thing.” She said with the biggest smile. As you move over, you had to back up.

“Awe, Katie! Your feet stink!”

“Yeah, they do.” Katie said snickering. “I’m not the one who is about to give them a foot rub though. Good luck!”

Great, doing this, you are gonna have to cover your nose as well.
15551121321211111.title: What Is Katie Doing?

choices: On my belly
On my chest
Against my cheek
155511213212111113.content:
As you move closer to her giant foot, you try your hardest to ignore the smell that you were getting. She really didn't wash her feet did she. Regardless, you move your way closer. Putting your hand on her sole, getting some dirt on your hands.

"Can you even feel my touch?" You question to her as she moved her feet around. Letting you see her giant face between them.

"Honestly, can feel it pretty good. Keep it up, I really appreciate it." Katie said, as you had to smile at that. At least she was thankful.

So you start your work. Putting both your hands onto her sole, and pushing it. You push as far as your little muscles can do, and then you start moving around. Transitioning the push around her sole. At least to the parts that you can reach it. You really try, to at least make Katie happy. That's just the guy you are you suppose.

So you start rubbing where you can. Getting tired but being efficient. You worked as hard as you can, until finally you couldn't take it anymore, you collapsed back onto the bed.

"You aren't stopping are you!?" She questioned very against the idea. You see her shift her entire body bringing her feet back, while bringing her face forward.

"Why are you acting so disappointed?" You snicker at her. Laying on your back.

"Why do you think, that was an amazing foot rub!" She told you, honestly perking you up a bit more. You can't help but grow a small smile from it.

"Not gonna lie, that kind of makes me glad." You say to her as the next part... Didn't."

"If you can't beat the gym leaders... Maybe you can try to make a deal with a foot rub!" Clearly it was suppose to be a playful jest but it felt more painful. So you continue.

"Well... I am done. Sorry if you want more of a foot rub, but I'm feeling tired." Katie frowned. She actually wasn't joking or messing with you. It was one great foot rub! She's a bit sad she doesn't get more... But that doesn't mean she can't have some fun.

While you were walking away, you turn your head just in time for her bare sole to be over you! Not that you could do anything about it. It came right down onto you... Pinning you on your back. Unable of course to do anything about it as she held you there. You did try... Lifting it off of you with all the power you can muster.

Spoiler warning... It wasn't much, as you barely budged it. You laid there, bit of a sour look on your face. Half because of the situation, other half because of the stench that coming from the foot on top of you.

"Katie!" You yell at her, as she couldn't help but laugh.

"I've decided little guy, I'm going to give you a foot rub! So... I will rub my foot over you!"

"Katie!" You shout to her as you suddenly feel she shifting it around on your back. Sliding her sole as you can't believe she was doing this. How humiliating. Also... Kinda good?

Because she was being so gentle it felt like a massage for you. So you can't deny that it felt good. Still stunk though, without question.

She shifted her sole over you for a while, until she stopped and... "Boop." She joked, tapping the top of your head with her toe.
She started to laugh, Katie finding it funny as she brought it to the side. While you just look at her less than amused.

"Come on I was just playing." She giggled
"With that cross face, you only come across as cute you know that right." She joked as you need to keep that in mind.

-

The rest of the night admittedly wasn't bad. You two just talked and since the both of you were planning to become champion it had a lot of things to do with strategy.

"I'm telling you... I just need a Dragon type. Those things are unstoppable!" Katie said. "Lance, Clair, Drake. The best trainers have Dragons."

"I mean they are strong but against Ice and Fairy not so much."

"Ehh... Dragons are still the best." She said with a shrug that got you to smile. "Anyway, turn around little guy while I change for bed."

"O-Of course." You say not expecting it to come so suddenly. You turn and you hear shifting around behind you. So you just wait, tapping your hands on your thighs and whistling. When you finally got the go on the turn around, you see her dressed in her sleepwear. A white loose shirt as well comfy shorts to sleep in.

"Okay... Ready to sleep!" She said happily to you. Katie reaching for you and picking you up. While you... You had to question.

"Where am I going to sleep? It is one bed..." You look over the place, wondering while Katie... Thought it was pretty obvious.

Clearly though you aren't thinking about it... So she will explain.

"Well... You did give me a foot rub, and I kind of did bully you so... You can sleep on the bed with me!"

"W-W-With you!" You shout. A blush on your face as you couldn't believe it. She really just said that. She must be bolder than you thought!

"Don't look at me like that." She said back to you a bit of a snap. "I'm doing this for you. You can sleep with me on the warm bed... Now the question is... Where am I going to put you?" She said in a very mocking fashion. "Bet you would like to pick Wouldn't you?" She laughed. Noticing that you were still being quiet. "Well at least you aren't gonna be loud tonight hehe. Now where to put you... Oh I know! She said very happily, smiling at you. "You can sleep ________
155511213212111113.title: Katie's Foot Rub

choices: Rustboro City
Mossdeep City
Slateport City
1555112132121111131.content:
"K-Katie, I'm not really sure how to feel about this." You say to her, laying on her bare stomach. You fought for laying on her shirt but Katie was not having it. So... Here you were.

"Relax... You will be fine, and warm. You should be thanking me if anything." She said, a bit upset at the fact that you weren't happy. Offended even. Katie thought she was a pretty cute girl. In her mind most boys would jump on the chance to lay on her stomach. Here you were though, complaining and scared. Regardless she was doing it. Laying back down, she turned off the light. Every light movement that she was doing was enough to throw you around. It was like laying on a water bed that you could not actually control.

With the lights off, you couldn't see anything. It became worse when you felt a thick layer of fabric come down onto you. Pinning you down and really making sure you were stuck.

"There we go. Goodnight little guy, tomorrow... We will be in Hoenn!" She said this as you guess you will. First time travelling to another region and it's by smuggling your tiny body with a giant girl. Not what you expected.

Still... It was nice, and you were excited. With that excitement for the next day, you didn't struggle much when going to sleep.

-~

"What are you doing?"

"H-Huh?

"What are you doing. You aren't even trying to find me!"

"M-Mew! Listen I need you to grow me big please. I didn't agree to this game and-"

"No you gotta find me!"

"I can't Mew. I was doing something before meeting you. I gotta see it through. Besides... I'm on my way to Hoenn right now."

"Hoenn got it!”

"What?"

-~

When you woke up on the next morning, your eyes went wide as you heard a loud sound. A very loud sound that woke you up, but funnily... not it’s intended target. Her alarm was set early, and you were up quick. Your hostess was not though, as she slept through it. You of course wanting to go on that plane went over and tried to wake her up.

"Katie! Katie come on get up!” You yell at her, at her chin as you can't believe it. How heavy of a sleeper is this girl? Standing on her face, you stomp a couple of times wanting her to get up. She didn't but she did sleepily swing her hand to you. You dodged it at the last second, but it almost knocked you off. "H-Hey! Fine... If you wanna be that way." You shout to her, as you then move over. Crouching right over her eyes... As you simply just slap her giant eyelid.

This not only woke her up, but made her jerk awake. Getting up to a sitting position and freaking out! She screamed, and you fell onto the blanket over her lap.

"H-Hey! What was that for!?" She yelled, angry and rightfully so. However you had a very good reason."

“Your alarm went off! We are going to be late!" You shout at her as she understood. Eyes open and listening in for the alarm. She acted quick. Switching clothes, grabbing her bag. Making sure her Pokeballs were on. You did the same as she scooped you up. Holding you in her hand, she quickly exited.

"We need to feed our Pokemon!" You remind her.

"We can do that when we get there. We need to go!" The girl kept running. Sprinting as she left for the airport.

-

"We... Got here." Katie said. Tired as she fell down in her seat. Literally the last one on the plane. Man was she tired. "They took my bag... But thankfully they didn't see you." Katie said opening the bottom of her shirt. She saw you... Clinging onto the inside. You drop down and breath a sigh of relief. You couldn't see much but you could see Katie by the window. Of course you were on her lap, as an empty seat was next to you.

"That was close. We are on it though. Should be a couple hours right?" You question to her as she nodded.

"Yep! Which means we got time to just relax. Let me..." She reached for you. Her fingers on you as you get thrown to her shoulder. Standing there. That wasn't the end though, as she moved her hair over you, hiding you. "There we go, no one wi see you. Now... Time to relax."

She moved her hands around to the back of head relaxing. As you did the same... Relaxing.

-

The trip was uneventful. You two talked some more, Katie got eyes cause everyone thought she was just talking to herself, and you two ate some peanuts. You got to admit... You've become pretty good friends with Katie. She was a nice girl, a bit playful and bullish at time, but still nice.

After a couple of hours. "Here we are... Look out the window!" She said happily as you did just that. Looking out and seeing the land of Hoenn. It was really something else, Swablu's in the clouds.

Looking down at the large land, so this was Hoenn. A bit excited you are, about how this turns out. Looking back up at the flying Pokemon, you looked at them for a long while... until finally you saw something. A pink tail in the clouds, hiding behind one.

Was that... so Mew really is in Hoenn. You thought it was just a weird dream, but if she is here... maybe you can go to her. All of Hoenn though, you weren’t really in a better situation.

“Hey, what’s up?” Katie questioned, noticing your small face. You look at her for a couple seconds until you shrugged.

“I-It’s nothing.” You say back to her. “So uh... we are gonna be landing soon, where will we be.”

“Oh, this is a flight _____________”
1555112132121111131.title: Off To Hoenn!

choices: Beautiful woman (Roxanne)
Little girl
Little boy
15551121321211111311.content:
“And we landed in Rustboro!” Katie said with a massive smile. Turns out she was really happy about it, as she walked out of the airport with her bag around her shoulder, and you on her shoulder. Using her long hair to hide yourself. “So, what do you wanna do now? I think I might wanna catch a Pokemon here!” She said happily, while you... you were thinking about something else. “Hey, what’s up?” She questioned, walking forward and picking you into her hand.

“Nothing it’s just... well I was thinking about something else. Anyway, if we are here, let’s go to the gym first!” You shout to her happily, as she didn’t share the same excitement.

“I don’t know, my Pokemon might not be ready. A bird against a rock, not a good result. Cubchoo, although his ice attacks are strong, might not be ready. I think i’ll catch a grass type or water type here.”

“Well, that’s cool. Can you drop me by the gym and then I will do that.” You say to her as she paused.

“W-What, seriously? You wanna go in there by yourself.” She said to you.

“I uh... yeah, that was my original plan. Something wrong?” You question to her.

“Nothing it’s just... you sure you’re ready?” She questioned, as you snickered.

“Feeling a bit protective of me are you?”

“Hey, if you get stepped on it’s gonna be my fault. I brought you here.”

“We are both trainers, and if I remember, I bet you. I’m ready, so drop me off please!”

“Fine fine, i’ll get a map.” She said. Katie has to let you be, not like she could babysit you your whole journey. Would take the fun out of it for you.

-

“So this is the place, it’s huge!” You say to her, before listening to your words. “And it’s not only because i’m small.”

“It says right here on the map that this is a gym/school. Kind of weird right. Are you sure you wanna do this? You can come with me if you want?”

“I’ll be fine.” You say to her with a smile. It is a good thing that she cares for you, but you are sure you can handle yourself. “Thanks for taking me Katie! Good luck with your catching, hope you find a shiny!”

“I hope I find one too.” She commented. “Hope you win.” She said with a smile as you nod. She walked inside, just inside and dropped you at the front. Looking ahead, it looked more like a school. With benches, and a long hallway. “I really don’t wanna leave you here.”

“I’ll be fine. I’ll bring out my Pokemon as soon as I can. Nobody is gonna step on a Teddiursa.” You say to her with a smile, which did calm herself a bit.

“Well bye, next time we see each other, i’ll be the one taking the victory.” She said, standing tall and leaving. You have now been separated with Katie, and by yourself. Not for long though, as you start moving.

Planning on finding someone. You know you told Katie you would actually bring out your Pokemon, but you want them well rested. They would be a bit hungry and thirsty though, maybe the gym leader can help you with that. Still it was a bit weird to walk through a giant school. You know that Gym Leaders have every right to customise their place of work, but still it was a bit weird.

Suddenly, you heard a bell and this made you panic a bit. Moving to the side and under a bench as you watch giant children coming out. It wasn’t the biggest of school, and you do think this would be the only class of kids, maybe another. They all grabbed their bags and went of to play. Doing their own thing as none of them saw you.

So even a giant kid towered over you, that scared you a bit but it was something that you were gonna have to accept. Still, they came from that classroom, so maybe you can find Roxanne there.

You are assuming she was the teacher or something along those lines. So you get going, moving over and getting over it. No giant kid grabbed you, so you got inside. A lot of chairs, and a blackboard. Looking over, you could see basic type advantages and disadvantages on the board. They were kids, so she was teaching them the basics.

Still, that doesn’t change the fact that she was not here. You wonder about what you are going to do, just wait here... well you got no other option if you were going to be honest.

So you move around, and wait at the entrance. Better then being out there with the kids. You aren’t an idiot, you knew why Katie didn’t want you to be here. A gym leader is responsible, the student kids would not be. Still, you can handle it.

As you wait, you might as well think over your strategy. Not like you had another thing to do. So Rock type. Of course, Nidoran and Double Kick will be helpful. However, if a duel ground/rock type comes that might mean trouble for her. Teddiursa of course, doesn’t have a good advantage against rock types, but she is a fighter. You are very confident she can handle it. Maybe lead with Teddiursa, and bring out Nidoran for the finally. She’s a gym leader, so she will know what she is doing. There is no doubt about that.

While you were thinking about your tactics, you suddenly hear footsteps. This one was different from the other ones outside, as it was coming closer to you! You get excited, as you stand and wait right at the door.

You were filled with so much excitement, until it finally happened. You saw someone come through the door, it was a giant ______________ standing over you, big and imposing.
15551121321211111311.title: Rustboro Gym

choices: You hang on
One of the school kids see you and tell Roxanne
155511213212111113111.content:
(Gonna keep it vague so you can imagine which Roxanne)

Roxanne V1: https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb...

Roxanne V2: https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/b/bd/...

You watch as who comes in, as she was... very... very pretty. You fell for her almost instantly as she towered over you. You were able to see her stockings under her large dress as she walked her way forward.

Her brown hair moving as she walked as she went to the desk. Was this Roxanne? You think she might be, she is a year or two older than you, and massive. Well, you got to get her attention. After all, she was your target.

So you start to move around, watching as she goes around and pulls out some things from her desk. She was also the teacher? What a nice person she must be. Not only does she have her responsibility for being a Gym Leader? She was also a teacher. You plan to start, going over and right to her large shoes. You just need to get her attention, thankfully with it being just you and her, she should be able to easily hear your voice and...

Almost as soon as you heard that, a sound happened as it made you freak out. That was a really loud bell! Sitting down as you wonder what you are going to do? Became even worse as you saw giant kids coming in. All of them having their backpacks, from ages 5 to 13 as they all sat down at the desk.

Kids were not quiet, that was for sure. You couldn’t even raise your voice above them, no matter how much you hoped.

“Okay okay! Take your seat please.” Roxanne said, her tone being strict but kind. “Now time to go over moves, everyone pull out a piece of paper, I want you to write this down.”

“Yes Miss Roxanne!” They said in unison as Roxanne stood up. She took a couple of steps, and under her you get threatened to get stepped on. Freaking out as you move around and avoid actually getting stepped on. Moving to the side as you wonder what you are gonna do? Well, with all the kids your voice isn’t gonna be heard. Sure she was teaching, but the kids were still talking there.

So right now, you guess you were gonna have to think of a new plan. Bring out Teddiursa, no that could be bad. Don’t want to erupt panic. So right now, you might as well go. Accepting it as you move around, going over and right to her shoe.

You move around and climb on top, standing on her shoe as she walks around. Wiping the blackboard clean, as she started to right down with the chalk.

“Okay, now there are many types of attacks, some physical, some special and some effect. Each of them is related to a specific type, and-”

You stopped listening, as you needed to focus the problem at hand. So you get going over, right over and to her stockings. So finally, you start climbing your way up, planning on getting high up her body.

Not the best way to get her attention, but it’s the one you thought of. So you climbed up her large stocking, which went all the way far up her dress. Maybe you should not go up there, climb on the outside of the dress and get going.

W-Wait a second, you are not really sure you can do that? Maybe... you are gonna try to make the jump.

“Now who can tell me how these Pokemon learn moves?” Roxanne questioned, as she started to walk around. She moved around and you could barely believe what was happening, as she strolled. Don’t fall off, you are not even at her knee at this point.

“Pokemon can learn moves from levelling up right?”

“Yeah... and TM’s!”

“Don’t forget HM’s!”

“W-Wait a second, don’t some Pokemon know moves from birth?”

“That’s right Cindy. You see, these are known as Egg moves. Certain moves can be carried on from their parents attacks. Quite interesting actually, to not get into the biology of it-”

Wow, this girl really knows what she is talking about. You could really learn something to her, but still you get going. Going up to her knee as the thing you were grabbing suddenly felt a bit hard. Regardless you move up closer and to her thigh, climbing up high as you can as you keep doing it more and more.

When you finally reached her thigh, you turned your head around seeing that you could reach for the dress... maybe?

You try to reach out for a second, only finding that no matter how much you tried, you couldn’t reach. You had to accept it, so what was your next plan? Climb on the inside of her dress, no that was not a good thing to do.

What can you do? What can you do? Keep trying to yell out? Well you haven’t tried it yet.”

“H-Hey, listen!” You shout up to her, when suddenly she turned to her class.

“No interrupting Derrick!” She yelled to the class trouble boy.

“I-I didn’t do anything!”

“Quiet!” She kept yelling as she then started her work. You guess you have to accept what was happening. You look around and try to wonder what you are going to do? Questioning it and thinking about what you were going to do?

Well... guess you just have to hang on her thigh? Just hold on until the class is finished. Just keep your grip.

Well, might as well listen in on her lessons. It does seem like very basic stuff, but you figured you might listen to something that don’t know.

Roxanne talked about moves even more, listing off the effects they can all have about it, talking more and more as you were shocked at how good she was. She even went into more complicated moves like Destiny Bond as well as Trick Room. You wonder if you are ever gonna get a Pokemon that knows those moves.

What happens next?
155511213212111113111.title: Roxanne's Classroom

choices: She will give you this Gym Battle
She won't, no matter how much you plead
She will, but if she wins you end this journey and stay with her
1555112132121111131112.content:
As you crawl over the leg of the teacher, you try to figure out the best plan. Somehow you figured just staying there and holding on was the best tactic for you. When there was less kids around, you were gonna make your move. You haven’t got the best grip strength, but you do have determinations in spades and you were gonna show it. So you keep hugging, hugging for a long time until finally you hear a sound that threw you off.

“Little guy!” it was a child, and you froze. Turning your head and looking the classroom, one of the girls at the front has spotted you, and she has waited no time whispering . You looked over to them, as more and more kids spotted you. The whole classroom knows about you at this point, as they can’t help but giggle.

Roxanne, who was writing something on the board noticed this. She turned her body around and looked at the young girl. “Mary, is there something you wanna share with the class?” She said unaware why they were all actually laughing. The laughter didn’t end, but she was going to be filled in on it.

“A-A bit, miss... you got someone on your leg?” She chuckled as Roxanne was confused.

“Some... one?” So she looked down, and the girl was stunned on what you saw. You were hugging there, right onto her stocking as you saw her face peeking over the skirt. Well you were found, but whether that was good or not remained to be determined.

“I uh... hi there!” You say nervously waving at her. “Do you mind picking me up, it’s really high up here... at least to me!”

The kids laugh at you as Roxanne continues to look. She did reach her hand down, her fingers gripping you as you breathed a sigh of relief. You get pulled ahead as you could hear the kids chattering and talking about you behind.

“Hello miss Roxanne!” you say in her grip and right in front of her pretty face. “Sorry, I was planning on holding on until your lesson is over. We-”

“So you can wait until my lesson is over.” She said as that was not a reaction you expected. “I’m not that big a fan of my class getting interrupted, so let’s fix that.” She moved around, moving around and going behind her desk.

She opened her drawer and gently placed you in. You didn’t expect this, but at least you were out of sight. Roxanne looked down to you. “We can talk after class, let me finish this up.”

Of course you didn’t have a complaint, as you felt the whole drawer move as she closed it. With it closed, she went back to teaching. You listening in as you were now in darkness. At least you didn’t have to hang on for glory this time, as you just relaxed.

-

So the class continued, and obviously Roxanne wasn’t happy. Her class was now interested more in the tiny man than the study she was teaching.

Speculations and theories arrises all of them being interesting as Roxanne ended the class. She wasn’t sure a single student listened, so she was gonna correct that.

“Now, for homework I want you to study pages 6 to 11. We will be having a test tomorrow so you better study. Also, be focused. This is school, you are here to learn.”

“Yes miss Roxanne!” They all said as class ended. They all started to make their way out of the class, as Roxanne waited for all of them to leave before starting.

She went and sat at her desk, as she moved her hand around. She reached it and opened it up, getting you to trip at the action.

“I uh... hi there!” You say with a wave. “Sorry about interrupting your class.”

“They rarely pay attention, so it was not entirely your fault.” She said as she reached in. Roxanne grabs you and you felt yourself moved over closer to her. You get grabbed and brought onto the table standing before you. “My name is Roxanne, Gym Leader of Rustboro City.”

“My name is (Your Name), and that’s why I am here. For a Gym Battle!” You say to her as she looked down, almost like she couldn’t believe you.

“For the Extravaganza, you have more pressing things to do, you should focus on that.”

“Yeah... the size. Well I got shrunk by Mew, and she wants me to find her... so that’s not an option. That was just before it started, the Extravaganza, so i decided to just go ahead and do it. After all, it’s not like i’m battling.”

“You shouldn’t be on this journey.” She said to you. “You know how much risk you are putting yourself in (Your Name)?”

“I do, but i’m still doing it. Don’t worry, I figured everything out. I have got a microphone that lets me yell commands, I got Pokeball that are funny enough the same size as me. I even figured out a way to move over through regions. I’m actually through Kanto!”

“Kanto!” She said back to you, still in disbelief. “You came this far, do you realise the trouble you are putting yourself in. What if one of my students found you before I did, you would of been taken right there!”

“Yeah but... I got strong Pokemon. Look all I want is a battle, you will see that I can take care of myself.”

She looked down to you and really thought about what she was going to do at the moment. She didn’t think it would be smart for you to go on this journey. If your Pokemon fail you out in the wild, there is nothing you can do at the moment. At the same time, who was she to deny a trainers dream, no matter how large (Literally in this case) that dream may be.

Roxanne looked down to you, thinking about it until she decided _____________
1555112132121111131112.title: Roxanne Knows About You Now

choices: You win it!
Roxanne beats you, and you are hers now
15551121321211111311123.content:
Geodude: https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/9/98/...

Roxanne looked at you, really thinking if she should do this. She thinks you going on this journey was a mistake, and you being stubborn could be the end of your life. Any wild Pokemon, regardless of the size could overpower you. Whether that is a Zigzagoon or a Nincada. She didn’t want you to do this... but at the same time it was commendable.

If you have the desire to be a champion, you aren’t even letting your size stop you. She knows that she should be take action, but she couldn’t just stop your dream now. At least, has to make it fair.

You can tell Roxanne was wondering and thinking about what she was going to do. Until finally she gave out a sigh, coming to her conclusion.

“Okay listen, I will make you a deal.” Roxanne said. “We will have this gym battle, if you win, you get the Rock Ribbon.”

“Great!”

“If I win however, you gotta stop this stupid dream. You will quit being a trainer, and stay here.”

“W-What! That’s not fair!”

“It’s entirely fair!” She shouted back. “You are lucky i’m even giving you this, I don’t think you are safe. When you lose, I will look after you. Making sure you are fine.”

You look to Roxanne, thinking about the deal. She’s not gonna give you a gym battle if you don’t agree. You’ve come this far, you gotta go along with it. You need to beat her.

It’s just a little bit more risk, you are use to it.

“You’re on! I’m gonna show you how strong I am!” You shout to her. Roxanne in her mind was doing this for your own good. However... she was hoping you were strong. She will see.

Roxanne didn’t expect during today, that she might have a small man to look after all later on.

-

“The Gym Battle between the Rustboro City Gym, Roxanne and the challenger will now begin!” An officiator said. Both of you facing each other in the large empty room. It was something else for you, a brown ecstatic with a rocky battle terrain. Roxanne was like a whole city away from you, and the officiator in the middle.

As Roxanne, she could barely see you on the other side. “I doubt this will turn out well for you, but i’m giving you this chance! Don’t waste it!”

“I won’t!” You shout, being so far away though of course she didn’t hear it.

“The battle will be a 2 vs 2 Pokemon battle. While the challenger can switch out their Pokemon! The Gym Leader cannot. The winner will be determined when two Pokemon from one side are knocked out and unable to battle!” The officiator said as it was time. You grabbed your little microphone and smiled.

“Go Geodude!” She yelled, sending out her Pokemon. Growing up in Kanto, you recognised the rock with two arms.

“Geo!” He shouted, stretching. It’s rock ground, with high defence for this level.

“Gotta save Nidorina, Go! Teddiursa!”

“Teddi!” She shouted, happily jumping and stretching. While Roxanne breathed a sigh of relief. At least your Pokemon were normal size.


~

“Is that your trainer!” Geodude said. “He’s not fit for battle, must suck being his Pokemon!”

“Oh, you are so going down!” Teddiursa said taking a battle stance. Nobody insults her trainer.

~

“Ready Teddiursa, go Scratch!”

“Tackle Geodude!” Roxanne said as your two Pokemon rushed each other.

“Wait, focus on dodging it!” You change your mind as Teddiursa listened, leaping over Geodude as he rushed forward. Both Pokemon turning around.

“Geodude’s strong, we would of taken more damage if we traded blows.” You say to yourself. Strong attack, strong defence, but terrible speed.”

“Tackle again!” Roxanne yelled.

“Get ready, dodge it and counter with a Fury Swipes!” Which she did exactly like that, sidestepping the Pokemon, and landing so many attacks and swipes. So many, to the point where it was doing some damage.

“Rock Tomb!”

“In the air!” You countered her, almost instantly. Geodude struck the ground, sending pillars in the air. Teddiursa didn’t get count, jumping away.

“I’ll admit that was impressive.” Roxanne said. “How about this, Defence Curl!”

“No! Teddiursa it’s raising it’s defence, get in there and lay in Fury Swipes.”

“Teddi!” She said, going to the defensive Pokemon and striking. It was small damage, but with the amount that was happening you feel like it was good.

“Rock Tomb!” She yelled.

“Jump again!” You tried to counter. The same action happened this time, but Roxanne continued.

“Rock Throw!” She shouted. You see the rock pull into the ground, grabbing a large rock and tossing it at Teddiursa. In the air, she had no space to dodge and got hit. Falling and landing on it’s back, feeling pained. “Now Tackle Geodude!” She shouted as Geodude laid into Teddiursa with a nasty shoulder bump.

“Teddiursa, are you okay!” You shout to your Pokemon. She got up, but was wounded.

“Teddi...” She said between breaths. Clearly this was not working, Geodude was hurt but not as much as Teddiursa.

“Return!” You shout, calling your Pokemon back. “It’s not what I wanted, but I gotta get past Geodude quick. Nidoran, go!”

You sent out the Pokemon, as the poison type landed down.

“Nido!” She screeched as Roxanne looked at the Pokemon. Why would he send in a poison type? Geodude was a ground, resistant to it?

“Get close!” You shout to your Pokemon as it charged. Roxanne wasn’t gonna take a risk.

“Defence Curl!” She ordered her Geodude.

“before she gets it in,” You shout into the Microphone. “Double Kick!”

“D-Double Kick!” She shouted, as her Geodude felt it. Getting kicked right in between the eyes with Nidoran’s front foot, only for her to swing around, taking out Geodude with the back foot. Despite the defence, it was super effective, as well as a Critical Hit.

With all the damage before, only one result.

“Geodude is Unable to battle, the winner is Nidoran!”
15551121321211111311123.title: Your First Official Gym Battle
